case.state: Sorry I'm late, milady. A kitty was stuck in a tree.

Oh, it's strip poker? Well, well... I guess if you want me to poker, it's just polite to strip first!
"Oh no, it's strip poker, my secret identity, etc. etc." Bugaboo'll fix this right up if it doesn't go my way. But let's be honest, no matter what way it goes, it's going to be great for me!

~Cards.text~... aww, I don't want to lose.

~Cards.text~. But, you know, en français.
Well, ~cards.text~, I guess.
I'll handle whatever you can throw at me. So try and make it interesting. ~Cards.text~.

『{plagg}I never thought you were the type of guy to do nude photos.{!reset}』 Well, with a hand like this, at least it won't become anything more than nude.

I'd hate to give anyone the wrong idea, but this hand is pretty good. Not as pretty as Ladybug, though.
『{plagg}Ooo... Adrien, I'm seeing a good hand here...{!reset}』 It's not nice to... spoil the reveal, is it, Plagg?
Well, looks like I'm safe for another round. Pretty safe, anyway. 『{plagg}Safely pretty too, pretty boy.{!reset}』
Looks like you'll have to wait just a second before I'll take another trip back to the catwalk.

This hand is like a fashion shoot. Could go either way.
『{plagg}Ooo... those cards look prettttttty risky!{!reset}』 Plagg, don't insult their intelligence. 『{plagg}You're kind of insulting your own if you think otherwise, Adrien!{!reset}』
I could win with this. Could. 『{plagg}If you lose, are you going to take everything off? I feel like you should gamble more.{!reset}』

Well, this hand's okay. But, that's half the fun, isn't it?
I'm not shy. Well, I'm kind of shy. Sort of like the deck's inability to give me some good cards.
Well, not the best hand I've ever seen, but did you know I'm pretty good with mine?
『{plagg}You're awfully confident for a boy with a mediocre hand.{!reset}』 A superhero with a mediocre hand, Plagg.
Okay, who got all the good cards? I won't tell if you don't.
Hm... you know, it's kind of hard to be clever about having an okay hand. But if I stand here and look handsome, that's fine, right?

The anticipation is-- 『{plagg}Oh nooo! Adrien, is it killing you? Are you dying? ...To take off your clothes?{!reset}』 Plagg, you're being a jerk. I could win with this. Could. 『{plagg}You looooove me.{!reset}』
The anticipation is-- 『{plagg}Oh nooo! Adrien, is it killing you? Are you dying?{!reset}』 Plagg, you're being a jerk. I could win with this. Could. 『{plagg}You looooove me.{!reset}』
Hey, on the plus side, if I lose with this hand, you all get to see even more of me!
...Come on, dealer, my secret identity's not that interesting.
Oh, damn it. Looks like my luck's run out.
Kind of cataclysmic... but this hand's a little out of my control!
What's the deal with these cards? ...Seriously, this hand's catfood.
I know nobody asked, but I know you're all just being polite. Yes. My hand is awful. And not full of awe, no-no, I mean that it's reallllly bad.
This hand's bad enough, but do you really-- 『{plagg}Have to carry around the sock? Absolutely! It reminds me of Camembert.{!reset}』
I could win with this. Could. 『{plagg}Are you fantasizing about Ladybug again?{!reset}』 What gave me away? 『{plagg}The hand you decided to go with.{!reset}』

I'd rather be playing the game than not... but I also wish I'd been dealt a better hand. In the game, I mean. Outside of that, things are pretty great...

Oh-- whoops, I picked the wrong cards... I forgot I'm not suited up and can't lean into puns to win rounds.
Well, this hand's bad, but this boy isn't.

『{plagg}You're into this, aren't you?{!reset}』 A little. Well... more than a little. I could win with this. Could. 『{plagg}For such a sweet boy, you've definitely got a naughty streak. What a perfect Cat Noir.{!reset}』
Even if I have a bad hand, at least the rest of you get to enjoy it.

state.text: It's not the best hand... but I have better things to look at.

case.state: I'm pretty badass. But... my butt's not bad, right?

『{plagg}Say, they don't really know who or what I am, do they? You're the celebrity.{!reset}』 Good point, Plagg. This is... well, Plagg. He's a Kwami, which is a bit like a magic fairy. His aspect is Destruction. That about sum it up?
Hilda...? Do you think you, me, and Leonie?

Unlike some of us at this table, I hate liars. I'd never hide my secret identity from someone I'd care about.

Well, Bugaboo, any chance you're looking for another boyfriend? I don't mind that, but Ladybug's the only woman for me.
Ladybug's great for me, and it sounds like you'd be okay with me dating her... you... us? Ehehe.

See, Perona gets it! We're made for each other, my lady. Maybe Perona could get all dressed up and join us...?
Bugaboo, you can admit that you find boys in black cute, can't you? We can't help but want to see you undress.
Well, Bugaboo, I know I'm curious about what you're hiding.
Marinette... It's okay if Nadia and I... you know, right? I just want her to know that I'm... Well, I'm spoken for, but that doesn't mean I'm not allowed to... right?
See, Bugaboo? Lots of people love it. If only you'd let me try--
Jessie's the expert, and if she likes it, don't you think you could--

Now, if I were more flexible, I'm sure I'd be doing it more than once a day... but about once a day. It just feels good to feel good, non?
Honestly, I haven't watched many adult films besides yours since I was a teenager. I've got a lot of memories to think back on, or I can always find someone.

Why, thank you, Nami. We aren't going to a costume party, but we are quite the cute couple.

You know, I'd be more than happy to admit that I like flirting with you. Smart, pretty, and talented is a wonderful combo. Our state of undress, or not, isn't that important to me.

state.text: It takes a lot of bravery to do this kind of thing, Ringo. If you want some help getting home, let me know if you don't want to finish.

case.state: 『{plagg}Don't you wanna know who she is under that mask?{!reset}』 I do but... duty comes first. We can always fix this later.

『{plagg}Looks like Ladybug's not going to rescue you, Adrien!{!reset}』 Plagg, Ladybug'll deal with the Akuma.

case.state: You know, Mari-- Ladybug, I'm really letting it all hang out here...

state.text: If this doesn't convince you to suit down, I don't know what will.

case.state: I always did wonder who was under that mask. Lucky it's a pretty, successful fashion designer.

Ladybug-- Bugaboo-- uh... Marinette, it's still fine if I call you those pet names, right?

You look beautiful as always-- uh, by which I mean, as I imagine! You know. A lewd tomcat, and all that.

You know, besides the Akuma, this game's pretty sexy, right...? Not your feet specifically, but hey, when ~background~ calls, ~background~ calls.
『{plagg}Her feet don't smell as good as yours...{!reset}』 That's a... dubious compliment.
Say, do you need me to play a little less canny? We're out of costume now... 『{plagg}Boooo! Crush her!{!reset}』
Watch out, Bugaboo, or I might have to lead this time.
You know, you never let me take the lead. It's normally nice, but this time... I'm enjoying the win.
You know, normally I'd be a lot more undressed before I'd get to see this... I hardly mind.

So... anyone else catching your eye?
You know, I could throw the next few hands... but I get the feeling you're liking the attention from someone...
So... you look a little flushed, milady... what are you thinking?
What're you thinking about, milady?

state.text: I... honestly didn't expect to be so far ahead of you, Marinette... 『{plagg}You probably should've lost a few more hands...{!reset}』

『{plagg}I'm surprised she didn't take off her jacket.{!reset}』 I feel like we match in a lot of ways, Plagg. Like... even inverted we're not that different.

I have a feeling that you and everyone else wouldn't mind if I lost the next hand or three...

Hey, if you want to get naked with me, I'm not going to resist, milady.

I'm not the jealous type. So... if you want me to help, you'll just need to ask me.

I'm a model. Trust me, if you want to stick to the small stuff, I don't mind the attention.

To think, you're one thin sheet of cotton away from showing yourself off...
I like the way you look, with or without a bra... but you're welcome to surprise me by taking it off next, Marinette.
If you want to keep an eye on me, I wouldn't mind. Hands would be better, but I wouldn't mind.
You can watch if you want, but I'm not going to stop you if you want to join in.
I appreciate that we're keeping things even... but... I think you still have more to lose.
I'm used to modeling like this... so... are you getting excited or nervous?
I can't take my eyes off you.
You're especially beautiful, Marinette. I hope you don't mind if I can't look away...

state.text: 『{plagg}You're looking awfully shy now, Adrien...{!reset}』 I'm just... Marinette, what would you like me to do?

case.state: I might be further in the game... but somehow it feels like you're more exposed, Bugaboo.

I can rest my head on your chest if you like. There's more than enough cushion for me.

Marinette, you'll enjoy it if I lose, right? I mean, not that you want me to lose, but...

I definitely wouldn't mind seeing this look more often. It's tres chic.
Annnnnything I can do to get you out of those underwear? I want to enjoy myself if I lose the next hand.
If you like what you see, maybe you'll return the favor, milady?

Now this is simply the best. But I think it'd be better if you lost this next hand!
See you in a hand or two, gorgeous.

Better be careful, Hermione, or I'll be charming the pants off of you.

『{plagg}Oh... is this how you are without Ladybug?{!reset}』 Well... I'm perfectly happy with just myself. But... Hermione does seem fun. Even if she is English.

I think a woman's brain is her best asset. To think you'd be lucky enough to have multiple great assets. But... I'm having fun, aren't you?

Me-ow, my lady.
Don't start kitten me now... but I'd be happy for you to win, but excited for you to lose.
As long as you're having fun, I'll keep going. I'll tone down the puns and move into the compliments, though, if that's okay with you? You can flirt back if you're interested.
Hilda, as no stranger to pussycats... yes. Eagerly, and enthusiastically.
Oh, with great enthusiasm, Hilda. Please, just let me take care of you...
Ah... sorry, Leonie. I thought we were having fun. I didn't offend you, did I?
I hope I didn't upset you, Leonie. I really thought we were just flirting...
It was very much a compliment, Hilda. Any others you want to hear?

Critical Darling, sorry if I came off the wrong way. I'm no stranger to fuzzy kitties... but I just wasn't expecting it. I'd still... well, I'm sure we could still have a lot of fun backstage, if you know what I mean.
You really made my hair stand on end. But, if this is normal for you, I'm way more interested than worried, now.

I hate to keep asking questions, and you look gorgeous, but... the only hair you have is on your head, compared to a bat from my world that might be hairy all over... so... are you shaved or not? It doesn't really matter but-- curiosity is going to kill this cat, huh?
If you wanted... have you ever gone down on someone, Ringo? Or thought about it?
Well, who was that?
Are the rest of us not enough?
Hm... any dark secrets...? I have secrets but none that are pretty dark. Sometimes I wish I'd gotten the Ladybug Miraculous. It would've been nice to create things rather than just break them.

It's not exactly a dark, serious secret, but I do with I'd had the Ladybug Miraculous sometimes. It's nice to be who I am and do what I do, but I think creation is a lot more impactful than destruction.
I think liars are the worst, but... it's hard to keep a secret identity without deception, isn't it?
Does a secret identity count as a lie?
I... have complex feelings about my parents. Just because someone's trying to do the right thing, doesn't mean they always do, or that the way they get there isn't... awful.
Yeah... I think the family you choose, like partners, or friends, are a bit more important than just being related to someone.
A million dollars is a lot, but I think I've got everything I need. And if not, I make enough money and I'm charming enough. Besides, some experiences are ones you can't put a price on.
A million dollars...? Well... um... I'd probably donate it to a good cause. I'm not exactly struggling. Besides, there's things money can't buy, like this charming smile. Don't you think, Jessie?
Smoking is sort of distasteful, but I don't think there's anything wrong with it. I can't solve everyone's problems, so if it helps them feel better, who cares?
Smoking does make you look cool. But... I feel like if you're using cigarettes to relax, you probably don't need me to lecture you about it.
Little mistakes...? I think it takes a lot to make someone truly irredeemable. Flaws give people texture.
I think life is about learning from your mistakes. Nobody's perfect.
I'm.... not in too dissimilar a situation, Hermione. But... I think my partner would rather like it if I explored my options... if you wanted.
Well... my partner and I are in a similar situation... I think it'd be more the pity if we didn't enjoy the relative freedom...
Bugaboo, when have I ever led you astray? Unless you're suddenly very interested in a certain stray kitty!
Look at the Dealer! This ~background~? All of this exotic clothing? Some of the people here can't even tell what gender the villain is!
If you're so nervous about undressing, just try not to lose. Your secret's always safe with me, milady!
I've got plenty of scratching post left, milady, I'm not sure why you're so worried about it!
We've fought dozens, probably hundreds of card-themed villains! If you're so worried about the hands in this game, you can always hold mine, Bugaboo!
『{plagg}Wow... oh no... really...? It's like Ladybug had no idea--{!reset}』 Plagg, that's a little thick.
『{plagg}You know he has a big crush on you, right, Ladybug? Riiight, Adrien? {!reset}』 W-well, that's true, but...
I'm sorry if I've let you down, milady...
At least the view's not awful, right?
『{plagg}I will confirm nor deny anything further.{!reset}』 Aww, Plagg, you do care!
『{plagg}I'll offer my truth to the highest bidder! Adrien, or Ladybug, who can get me better cheese, I wonder? Though this sock is heavenly.{!reset}』 Plagg, now's really not the time...
Will that be a problem, milady?
Oh, I'd hate to distract you... but... only one of us is still suited up... maybe we should change that?
Well, we're both in pretty tight costumes... but mine's maybe got a little more padding.
I know, my personality sparkles a lot better when I'm naked.
The only one who's perfect here is you, milady... you can always make it up to me later.
Well... the cards don't lie, so neither will I. This is probably much easier for me than it would be for you, after all.

Mar-- Milady... don't go getting jealous... it's just part of the game. You can defeat Dealer on your own, can't you? It's nothing new for you... but... it's kind of hard to pretend there isn't more going on between us, right?
It's okay. I'm your prince, remember? I have to keep you safe... or at least your secret identity! ...Even if I do know what it is.
I think we'll manage just fine. Do I ever let you down?
Are you sure you don't want to just take off our costumes? It might be fun, you know!
『{plagg}You're playing strip poker with Ladybug, Adrien! Wayyy toooo gooooo!{!reset}』 Y-yeah... b-but... we should still try not to reveal our secret identities....
Ladybug, even if you lose... I-I-- 『{plagg}I'll get to see Tikki! C'mon, bring out Sugarcube already! Throw the game!{!reset}』 Plagg... now's not the right time...
If it's you asking, Ladybug, I'd happily throw the next few hands... but something tells me that you'd be more bothered by that.
Oh... I'm distracting you? I thought I was way more handsome in my costume... but if you like this look, maybe you'll like what comes next even more.
Well, about that... I may have used my Cataclysm not too long before coming here...To be fair, I thought it was an Akuma and not just a butterfly...
Unlike you, milady, I always land with my feet on the floor. I'm not going to let one little loss make me lose my cool.

『{plagg}It's suuuuch a relief to be de-transformed. Is this the part you reveal you already knew who each other were...? And hi, Tikki, great "voice of reason" thing you're doing.{!reset}』 I guess Plagg spelled that out...

I guess it's up to Adrien and Marinette to solve this one... Plagg and Tikki too. 『{plagg}The whole secret identity thing is no fun... unless you're a Kwami who knew the whole time! Moohoohahaha!{!reset}』
I'm glad I can still keep the magic alive for you, Marinette. 『{plagg}Camembert is stinky, but there's too much sugar here for me!{!reset}』
Well, Milady, it's not like this is something new for you. 『{plagg}Tikki, can't we get them to stop being adorable? It's even more nauseating than usual!{!reset}』
You aren't that far ahead of me, you know. I plan on making you work for it, at least.
Just consider my losses me giving you support. You might have the Lucky Charm, but it's hard to beat the villain all by your lonesome.
Well... it is my shirt next. I can throw this next hand if you'll really like what you see.
I'm a lot better at showing off than you are, Bugaboo. You're welcome to take your time... or take in the view, if you want.
I know who I'm going home with at the end of the night, Marinette, but it's nice of you to let everyone else enjoy the show.
Well... at least we're both enjoying ourselves. And speed isn't everything, is it, Bugaboo?
Oh, come on. You're having fun, aren't you? And besides, I know I look good.
Marinette, you know how many pairs of these I own. Seriously. You're the one that bought them for me. I'd be rude not to wear them.
Sorry, milady. I-I really did think there was an Akuma here... but... I hope you're still enjoying showing me off.
So... I'm not so sure there was an Akuma... b-but at least we can still have fun tonight, can't we?

Aren't you still a bit ahead of me? You've got your jacket... 『{plagg}Oh how cute! She takes off her shoes first, you take off your jacket first... you're made for each other. Now, how about some cheese? Your feet are making me hungry.{!reset}』
We're a perfect match, aren't we? ...We just undress in different orders... 『{plagg}I can't tell if people get more excited for: you or Marinette.{!reset}』Plagg!
Don't worry, Bugaboo. I'm not going to lose... though, technically, just playing this game with you really rings my bell.
Well, one of us is still suited up. So, just go ahead and relax, have a drink, feed Tikki some macrons, and watch the man work.
I appreciate the attention, Marinette... but could we be a bit more subtle? 『{plagg}This whole lovey-dovey square thing is so confusing...{!reset}』

At least I lost almost as quickly as you did... I think keeping up the facade would've been really hard after a while... 『{plagg}But wait, Adrien, what about your secret identities-- etc, etc. Let them have their fun, Sugarcube.{!reset}』
You say that like I never let you win. It'd be boring if I was perfect all the time.
I'm sure the two of us can handle it. Let's have fun, and when the Akuma shows up, we can suit back up. Easy peasy.
What can I say? I'm just a natural at all things debonair. Don't worry, Marinette, I'm not going to let both of us lose.
Don't worry, Bugaboo. You're always there when I need you. I'm not going to let you down now-- you worry way too much!
I'm no copycat! Like my clothes, I'm all original... mostly. It just made more sense to take my button-down off.
What, you're not enjoying the view? Maybe my goal's to get an even bigger lead, Marinette.
I wouldn't worry too much about that. But... I'm glad I can keep things interesting for you after all this time.
It's not quite as good as a secret identity reveal, but you're pretty light on your feet, milady. It'd be a shame not to make you dance!
Don't worry, Marinette. We might have some extra fun now and then... but you're always first in my heart.
We can stop whenever you want... but no matter what happens, I want you to know we're absolutely a team first.
The feeling is quite mutual. I can't say I'm not tempted to just join you.
Well, milady, the honor is all mine. You're stealing the centerfold, anyway.
Well... I do have one last surprise.
This is how it should be, the two of us, neck and neck... or maybe just a handful of distance between us?
I'd never let you lose. Though I might make you lose this hand if you don't watch out!
Well, everyone was having so much fun looking at you that I figured I'd get in on the action.
Well, if I win the game you lose, that's just not okay. 『{plagg}What are you talking about!? That's twice as bad?! Even I know that!{!reset}』
What's another secret identity at this point? 『{plagg}What's up, Tikki? And besides, he's wayyy more distracting than your Miraculous-holder, Sugarcube!{!reset}』
I think you all deserve an explanation. This is Plagg-- 『{plagg}The most handsome Kwami here! I'm a bit like a guardian angel. Even if I do preside over the power of Destruction.{!reset}』

『{plagg}Say, they don't really know who or what I am, do they? You're the celebrity.{!reset}』 Good point, Plagg. This is... well, Plagg. He's a Kwami, which is a bit like a magic fairy. His aspect is Destruction. That about sum it up?
...Did you really need to cheat?
We already pretty much saw everything... but I guess you could draw it out if you wanted.
Well... I can't say it's my favorite, but certainly not gross! But... there's something about it on you that makes it feel exciting. It was a surprise, but... I just... really want you, now.
I think you would look better with a bit of a trim... but... for some reason you're just... I just want you. Hair and all. In fact, maybe because of the hair.
My apologies if this is untoward, given that I'm a mortal and you're a goddess... but perhaps you'd be interested in teaching me the correct... ways to engage you, if you were to lose?
They felt amazing... you'd better be careful, or I might have to feel a bit more than just those...

I think I'd want to be sure my partner's needs are met. I'm so busy that it'd be hardly fair to promise all of myself when I know I can't do that. At the same token, it doesn't mean I don't want things that are meaningful.
I think I'd prefer an open relationship. Not because I'm particularly in need of multiple people... but just because that way I know my partner is always taken care of.
I'd love to be on the giving side of it, especially to a woman. But I'm fine using my own cul. If it feels good, what harm is there in enjoying yourself? Sadly, my partner doesn't really like it...
Anal? Well... a toy feels great back there. I've only had a man do it to me once or twice... but I'd love to be on the giving side to a woman. I've never had a girl who wanted me to do that...
I like the lights on. But there's something kind of fun of fooling around in the dark, don't you think? Especially when the person's new...
The lights off are so much more fun when you're getting to know the person. You really have to go by feel. But when you're really familiar, lights, of course.
I've got a normal sex drive, so... every day? Even with sex, if I'm not too tired?
I'd probably do it every day if I haven't had sex. Even if I have.
Ah... as often as possible, but maybe twice a day at most? Especially over a long term relationship, you don't want to learn all there is about a person too quickly, right?
Hm... I think as often as possible, but you can get tired if you do it too much, too often.
I'm a very "seeing is believing." So, why don't I get you to see and believe, Jessie?
You know, I'm a switch. So why don't I switch it up and show you, rather than tell you, Jessie?
I don't think I could respect someone who didn't respect me enough to tell me they were seeing other people...
I think consent's really important! You have to let people know if you're going to be having sex with other people.
I guess we would look pretty unconventional if someone hasn't seen a superhero before... but maybe we should take care of the villain, have a cat nap, and stick around a bit longer?
Well said, milady. Shouldn't we take down the villain now?
Shouko, just curious, do you own any cat-themed underwear? Or would you rather a different pussycat cover your soft little kitty?
Well... I'm so sorry to hear that. The least I could do is an autograph. I'm not sure a story does that level of care justice...
You seem really close to your friends... I'm so sorry to hear about that. Do you want an autograph? Or at least a good story to carry back to them, Sayaka?
I think models are overrated. But with your body... Well, it is impressive.
It's a good butt. Perfect for skirts. You really designed your outfit well!
You're definitely more intresting of average... but not in an intimidating way.I think you're cute, but relatable. Definitely attractive.
...Maybe it's a cultural thing, but I do think a bit of... upkeep would serve you well.
It's... I'm not a fan of your hair there. But... I also think it's a fixable problem.
We've known each other for... almost ten years, now? And to think how much things change. Or not. I know you've always loved me.
Plus, isn't a little roleplay and a little mystery fun? Just don't tell Cat Noir or Ladybug, heh.

We've got some other heroes here, don't we? Well, I'm sure you're eager to know about me-- no cat-related superpowers, just regular balance, agility, and the power to destroy everything I touch. Magical hero.

I'm the magical, mystical Cat Noir, of course. Agile, durable, and a few times a day I can destroy anything I touch. Magic, not innate gifts. If you don't include being supernaturally handsome. And yes. I do keep Paris safe.
...My hair's standing on end. What's come over you?
Is this a good thing or a bad thing, Pandemonica?
You can't tell, but I'm doing this to hide my blush. I'm really glad you like the way it looks, I thought of it myself!
I'm really glad you like it! If I don't say so myself, it really shows off some of my best features. Thanks.
『{plagg}...I'm sorry, Sheena. I don't know a Corrine. She wasn't a Kwami, was she?{!reset}』 Yeah... I'm sorry, Sheena. Plagg's my spirit guardian, in some way or another...
Ah. You had a spirit of your own, huh? 『{plagg}Would you be this sad if I left you, Adrien? ...I'll try not to leave you alone, then.{!reset}』
I know you mentioned a soulmate, Nadia... But... I'm already spoken for. We're okay with other people but... she's okay if we have some fun later.
...Though, Rouge, maybe it'd be fun to see if you could keep a few of my loads in you while you floated over her face?
This Entity you're talking about? How strong is it? It seems pretty dangerous, all things considered, Susie.
Not every day, but it's usually my tail that gets got. You're interested, aren't you? I know I am.
『{plagg}See, Adrien, I can help you even outside of superhero stuff.{!reset}』 Plagg, I'm pretty sure you're the kitty she wants to play with...
Why, thank you. I think. You're adorable, too. But... I'm more a Kwami than a Pokemon person.

state.text: 『{plagg}He really is! He gives me all the cheese off his salads,even.{!reset}』 It's true.
It's true, it is restrictive sometimes. 『{plagg}He still eats Marinettes pastries as often as he can.{!reset}』

case.state: Is that... one of your Pocket Monsters, May?
Oh, I'm sure you can find some way to do it the hard way, Polly.
I do have a publicist, you know. I don't think she'd be terribly upset if I caught a ghost on film. I might need to take some pictures of this for later, too.

Well... truth be told... I do have a partner. But she and I... well. Secret identities complicate things. So we're okay with an open relationship, but not... you know, being in love with other people.
Bugaboo's the love of my life, Polly. But... I think she'd be okay with you being the love of tonight as long as you're okay with that, too.
I'm really flattered, Polly. But... I also get to play the game with the Polly Geist. If I'm lucky, I might even end up naked with her, non?
I appreciate that, but... it's really no big deal. I'm just happy to play with... well, fine people like you.
『{plagg}She's right, you know. I am the kwami of Destruction.{!reset}』 Somehow I don't like where this is going...

『{plagg}Ah, Polly, Polly Polly. I'm flattered, but I just get so many offers that...{!reset}』 I don't think Plagg can even... 『{plagg}Nope. Kwami of Destruction, not love. But if you wanted him to, Adrien could destroy your--{!reset}』 Plagg!
You're really a goddess, aren't you, Noire? I have to say, you're in a whole different league.
Are... wow, you're really powerful, aren't you? Pretty, strong... you're really a goddess, huh?

state.text: 『{plagg}It must be so hard to be you, Adrien, always being wanted for your body.{!reset}』 You can ignore Plagg, Rarity. And yes, I am a model, though... there's more to me than that, right?

case.state: I tend to model in Paris... but I do a lot of magazine shoots, and travel for things, too. Interested in having me make a trip over to your neck of the woods?
I'd happily do both for you, Shouko.

『{plagg}Perona, if Adrien goes home with someone, can you take me home and take care of me tonight? I'll be a good plush kitty!{!reset}』 Plagg, you can't just go home with women because they're good with ghosts...
『{plagg}Perona seems much nicer to her spirits, you know. I bet she'd feed me cheese whenever I wanted!{!reset}』 Plagg, you can't just... What if I need you to transform?
『{plagg}You know, Perona, if Adrien seduces you and you take him home, I'll spend the whole night snuggling you!{!reset}』 That's... such a... are you helping out here, or not, Plagg?
『{plagg}Are you going to treat me like a snuggling wuggly stuffed animal tonight, Perona?{!reset}』 He's not making the worst argument, as long as you're willing to feed him.
I know we're here to get naked... but isn't this a bit on the nose?
Huh. I guess we have a way to clean off after the fun parts....
It's pretty dark here, huh? Well, good thing I can see just fine.
Hm... dark in here, isn't it?
This is... kind of awkward. You're not seriously expecting a superhero to reveal his identity in front of a crowd, are you?
Sigh. Really? We're playing strip poker with an audience...?
At least it's nice out here...
Hm... the cards are whatever, but at least it's nice out here.
Ah... nice day to be at the beach.
You know, I don't mind getting down into my shorts... but you probably want me in less, don't you?

Don't worry, you've got a superhero at your table tonight! I keep Paris and the Parisians that live there safe from supervillains. Like Hawk Moth. He makes people into monsters if they're having a bad day. No big deal.
Since I'm the only hero here, let me tell you a little about me. I know you're all dying to know, but I've got nine lives. Anyway-- I protect Paris from supervillains of all sorts.
『{plagg}Blah blah blah, I'm Plagg, the Kwami of Destruction, this is Adrien Agreste, prettyboy model and my lucky superhero.{!reset}』 ...Well, he said it better than I would. Nice to meet you all.
You can call me Adrien, now, by the way. I might be a superhero, but I'm a normal guy. 『{plagg}And I'm Plagg, the Kwami of Destruction. I'm also a normal guy. ...Not really, though. {!reset}』
I'm Adrien... 『{plagg}...And I'm Plagg, his Kwami. Nice to meet you all. But honestly, Adrien, I'm huuungry. {!reset}』 I'll feed you, I'll feed you.
So who runs this place, anyway? Is it some sort of robot, or magic, or what? Nobody ever seems to have their story straight.

state.text: 『{plagg}I don't really need to watch you masturbate, so I'll leave soon.{!reset}』 Thanks, Plagg.
Plagg, do you mind...? 『{plagg}I'm sure I can find some mischief to keep me busy... while you busy yourself, Adrien. Have a great jerk.{!reset}』

case.state: "Where's Ladybug?" I know, I know. I'm used to playing second kitty to Ladybug, but she's off saving Paris. I'm here to have a good time.
Don't tell her I told you, but Ladybug and I are kind of a thing. But it doesn't mean we can't explore our options.
Bugaboo's really special. She's a great leader, and Paris is lucky to have her. I'm lucky to have her as a friend.
I think Ladybug'd have a purrrrrrfect time here. Black and red cards, an element of luck, handsome company like yours truly... maybe it'd get her to unwind and be less serious.

Hard to believe that you can have Cat Noir without Ladybug... but just because we're a pair of heroes doesn't mean we don't have our own interests, don't you think? She's much too serious to have fun, sometimes.

Hm... 『{plagg}Are you thinking about playing this with Ladybug...? Or Marinette?{!reset}』 If both is an option... they're both lovely women with great character. 『{plagg}And sex appeal, to him, anyway.{!reset}』

『{plagg}What do you think Ladybug looks like under the suit? Probably like... oh, I don't know, Marinette...{!reset}』 I think they're both amazing in their own ways... I'm not sure what you're getting at.

I wonder if anyone I went to school with would be fun to play with, here. 『{plagg}I think Nino or Marinette or Alya.{!reset}』
Somehow, I think Chloe would be the most likely to show up.

『{plagg}Is there anyone you'd want to play this with?{!reset}』 Besides Ladybug? Marinette. I bet she has good fashion sense all the way down. 『{plagg}I'm sure you could just ask her out, you know.{!reset}』

『{plagg}We're going to get some cheese after this, right?{!reset}』 Of course! 『{plagg}Why don't we stop by that bakery you like?{!reset}』
Marinette's family are the best bakers in Paris.

『{plagg}You're feeling pretty confident for a... I guess you do get naked for work pretty often.{!reset}』 I'm not naked, Plagg, I have you to keep me covered. 『{plagg}I meant modeling, but I can always Cataclysm anyone who bugs you.{!reset}』

state.text:
『{plagg}Is this like one of your modeling gigs? There's not even fancy cheese...{!reset}』
Not quite... it's just a game I'm playing. One with some... people I'd really like looking at me.

『{plagg}I've got a spare sock over here. I've even been aging some Camembert in it!{!reset}』
Plagg, I don't like liars or cheaters. I'm going to win or lose honestly.

『{plagg}Paris is safe right now, isn't it?{!reset}』 I wouldn't be here if it wasn't in good hands. We have a full team of heroes that can deal with villains. If nothing else, society's a lot nicer when someone's bad day can become everyone's problem.

『{plagg}Why are you playing this? Can't you find cute boys and girls at work?{!reset}』
Not like here. Besides, I like games and don't get a lot of opportunities to play them.

『{plagg}You've lived in Paris your whole life, haven't you?{!reset}』
Sure, but I've traveled a lot. I just like my city. It's got culture, great food, and kind people. I'm really fortunate. Plus, I work there, so sort of hard to leave...

case.state: See, milady? It does take a fairly advanced scientist, but... we can't hide our love, can we?
It's a long history... but it all works out in the end.
It works out in the end, Shouko. But... yeah... we've been through a lot together.
It is totally a sex thing-- Bugaboo-- why lie to her?
Mm... well... truth be told... it's not that big of a deal here, is it?
Well, Milady took the lead, Komi-san. So I don't see the harm in it.
I do like understated women with a bit of ferocity to them. Someone who's not playing too hard to get, but doesn't mind making me work for it, at least a little.

There's a lot of things I see in her. She's beautiful, because she's pretty, but also because she's talented, and kind, and honest. We've had our rough spots, but Bugaboo's just amazing. I love her so much. Plus, she likes watching me play games like this.

If you're fishing for compliments, you're going to pull up quite a series of them, Mari. You're gorgeous, and interesting. I'd say it'd be a lot of fun to take you home... but we don't really need to wait that long, I hope?
You're one to talk. You've been flirting with everyone too. Maybe that means we have to just try and out-flirt each other, don't you think? And...
I like girls that are kind, and interesting, but have some mystique to them. Bugaboo's got all of those in spades. You do too, Mari.
Being with Marinette is like getting to enjoy filet mignon every night. It doesn't mean there's not room for eating out, if you don't mind two guests and inside seating, Mari?
Don't worry about it, Angela. She's having fun on her own, I'm sure. And while the Ladybug's away, it's time for me-ow to play!
Overwatch!? Wow-- That's... that's amazing! ~marinette~, can you believe that we'd qualify?
I think he’s a bit of a switch.
Well, my Lady, what do you think about Komi-san's....?
Oh? Well... I'll lady my Lady tell you a bit more about that...
Well... Of course! A relationship like ours, though, requires a lot of communication, but it works.
...Jealousy can be pretty normal... But seeing your partner fulfilled? That can really make you happy, too, right, bugaboo?
Well... A gentleman doesn't kiss and tell. But I can tell you some rumors. Unless you'd prefer me to focus on redeeming villains...?
Well, bugaboo? Why don't you start. Normally you take the lead on these things, anyway.
Just do your best, Ringo...!
Well... let's see. Maybe we should save some things for after the game...
I'd like to, but... maybe ~player~'d rather join in than watch, don't you think?
Well, thanks. I guess you could say I came here to sleep... in a way.
Ah, it's not usual a villain talks about me in a way that's not a taunt, so... thanks?
Well, would you prefer I keep the mask on, Shouko?
I wish that I could, at least for your sake. But... maybe you can find a substitute mask?
Do you have a fantasy about a man in a mask... taking care of you?
Ah... Ringo. I promise I can make it up to you in a little bit. Maybe a kiss? Anywhere you'd like?
I think you're due for something you can really think about, Ringo...

state.text: 『{plagg}I know, I know, I'm just the most dangerous and thrilling creature to ever exist.{!reset}』 Plagg, don't encourage her. I get the sense that she's not messing around.

case.state: ...You know, I was going to make a joke, but when you put it that way...
You've been flirting a lot tonight, Mari... sure you won't get tired if all of us decide to join in?
What's... Kalos? And are you hitting on me or making fun of me?
Overwatch!? Wow-- That's... that's amazing! Ladybug'd be so proud, too!
Well, Bugaboo, getting closer to you and having some fun in our own way isn't so bad.
You just made defeat look so fantastic, I thought I'd join you.
Oh-- right... Plagg.
Well... I can send him away, you know...
At your leisure, milady.
Of course, milady. Though... are you sure you wouldn't rather something bigger?
You know, milady, you could do more than just look, if you wanted...
I'm glad you're not... strictly jealous.
You're not making a compelling argument about not throwing the next hand!
Ah, you're simply the best, Marinette. But... I'm going to have a hard time keeping my head in the game...
Oh? Do you want me to tie you up... or spank you?
Milady, you're more than welcome to share...
Oh, have I been a naughty kitty, Marinette?
Only if you agree to do the same, milady.
Ah, sorry. Are you trying to threaten me with a good time?

Nagatoro-san, I'm the same person, just... dressed differently. 『{plagg}Nah, she's got you pegged, Adrien. You're way more confident as Cat Noir. By the way, if you want to peg him, he likes that, whatever it means.{!reset}』
H-Hey! What is your problem, lady?
Aww, you do care, Ladybug.
Are you sure you can't handle it all on your own, Milady?
Look, it's bad enough I have to lose my suit, but do you need to upbraid me?
Heheh... yeah... I'm starting to consider that was the wrong choice to try and impress you.
I might be Adrien right now, but I'm always Cat Noir too, milady.
Don't worry so much, milady. I can do plenty as Adrien. I'm still Cat Noir at heart, you know?
『{plagg}You're not afraid that your feet are going to smell bad and scare her off, are you?{!reset}』 Well... not until you mentioned it, no...
『{plagg}Don't be so nervous! You're still Adrien and Cat Noir. Even if Ladybug thinks your feet stink, you're going to be fine!{!reset}』 Well... that's not really what I wanted to hear, Plagg...
Don't you worry, Milady. I'm a model. I've done this before.
Don't be nervous, Milady. You're already doing so well, just consider me your knight in almost no armor.
The villain doesn't stand a chance against you. But I'm glad you're acknowledging my help.
Don't worry, Bugaboo. This villain doesn't stand a chance against both of us.
Maybe I just need you to see my best side so you'll start taking me seriously. I'm just happy to be here with you.
Maybe I just want you to see me naked. What about that?
I'd hardly expect it, but I'm not going to turn you down, Ma-- Ladybug.
Well, Ma-- Ladybug, I'm certainly interested to see what kind of Lucky Charm you use to get us out of this situation.
Oh, don't you worry, Bugaboo. You might have all the luck, but I bring the charm we need to get through this.
I'm pretty enchanting myself, you know. Maybe I'll distract the villain long enough for you to swoop in.
I'm not done yet. I have a few tricks up--
Well, I wouldn't say this cat's out of the bag or the bodysuit just yet, but--
『{plagg}The only time I think Adrien's cute is when he feeds me cheese so I'll listen to him pine over you.{!reset}』 ...You really think I'm cute, Ladybug?
Ladybug, you think I'm cute? Even outside of my costume? 『{plagg}If only you two had known sooner...! Wouldn't that have been something?{!reset}』

『{plagg}I wonder why your socks make me hungry. Maybe the smell's not too different from cheese?{!reset}』 Plagg, you're really not helping... doesn't Ladybug's Kwami like sugar? Maybe if you changed your diet I'd smell better...
『{plagg}Imagine smelling like a bakery... wouldn't that be so much less interesting than smelling like cheese?{!reset}』 I--I don't often smell that much like cheese...
Don't worry, Milady. A cat always lands on his feet. And a Cat Noir can take care of things just fine.
You seem so worried! We're playing cards. Making friends. Getting naked! Live a little, LB.
I'm sure Plagg is going to be a little more excited to see Tikki than she is to see him.
Well, if you're going to be comfortable and confident, Marinette, I suppose I can suit down...
You know it.
Well, I think you already know the answer to that.
『{plagg}Tikki! And I thought you were the sweet one!{!reset}』 ...Plagg, do you need to antagonize her?
It's either cheese or Plagg. It's not me! I swear! 『{plagg}Ugh, whatever! I can still get a whiff of them socks, right?{!reset}』
So competitive! Maybe you want to get me naked so you'll have some competition, don't you?
I think your wins are also my wins, is all.
A compliment's well worth my shirt, Milady.
Well, if you think this is exciting, maybe I ought to go ahead and keep losing, shouldn't I?
What's wrong, Marinette? Are you... you're not feeling jealous, are you?
...You seem upset, Milady. Are you... jealous, perhaps?
Aw, you're making me blush.
If you're trying to build up my confidence... consider me Cat Noir, Milady.

W-well, I-- I do hope I continue to live up to your expectations, Milady. 『{plagg}It's almost impressive, but watching Marinette fuss over you is far funnier when you consider how she is as Ladybug...{!reset}』
『{plagg}Oh, do those other times with Kagami and Luka not count?{!reset}』 Plagg, ssh.
『{plagg}The only people who act like this isn't fun are people who aren't having any.{!reset}』 Yeah, Tikki. The Inventory's a weird place, but... aren't we all just having fun?
『{plagg}Secret identity! Pfft. The real fun began after they found out who the other was, right?{!reset}』 Lighten up, Tikki! And you might be gaining ground, but this is far from over, Bugaboo.
You're talking it up a whole lot. I'm flattered but... as long as you like it, then the rest is just flattery.
Well... I'd hate to disappoint. So... here goes nothing.
Don't worry. She's only pretending to be mad to pretend like she's not enjoying how charming I am.
Well, well, Bugaboo! Maybe I'm just cursed to bring you bad luck in exchange for all my positive qualities?
I like her just the way she is, Tikki. As Ladybug or Marinette. So... time to join her.
Well, I'm certainly enjoying the attention, Marinette.
Aww... are you saying you wouldn't do that for me?
You know, I'd be happy to take off my shirt for you, Milady.
You know I'm wearing less exciting things than you are at this point, right?
Personally, my favorite way to match you is in our costumes... or nothing at all.
Oh, this game's all talent, milady. I'm sure of it.
I bow before your talent, milady. But this kitty is far from rolling over.
The confidence and interest is really flattering! I'm just glad we're together. It might be a bit much if we weren't involved.
And to think, I thought this was just friendly attention for so long.
Wouldn't that be more distracting for you? You don't have a lot left to lose, Marinette...
Do people do that? I... think I'll take off my shirt.
『{plagg}Don't worry, Marinette, I'm sure Adrien's only into whatever, and whoever you're into!{!reset}』 He's not wrong, milady... but he's not exactly tasteful, is he?
Don't worry, Bugaboo. No matter how we go home, we get to go together, don't we? 『{plagg}You too are so sweet, it's almost gross. Can I have some cheese for the compliment?{!reset}』
Well... I love you too, Marinette. I'm glad we're both having fun.
Well, with that kind of affirmation, there's not really any room for me to disappoint, is there?
I know. I'll get the Akuma, though. Just... hang in there a bit longer while I figure this out.
Don't worry, Marinette... there's still plenty of time for me to get that Akuma...
C'mon, Tikki, you know we'd never really have risked the reveal before we were ready, right?
Aww... well, the "Akuma" sure kept it interesting for us, didn't it?
Part of me really does wonder if you're choosing to lose to boost my self-esteem. But... maybe I'll just enjoy the win, huh?
If you're trying to show me off, that's one thing... but maybe for once I'll get to win a bit, huh?
You get to see me dress and undress every day, and you're still so invested? I'm flattered!
I feel the same way, milady. Shame you're so far behind me!
Tikki, if anything, maybe making us wait so long is what... makes this so appealing.
I think it's a lot more fun when we do things together. We spent so long as a set of four rather than just a pair of two... maybe we like having those extra angles to think about.
Say no more, milady.
You're not feeling shy, now are you?
I guess you'll find out soon, milady.
I thought you'd be watching me more closely...
If it can impress her, the rest of you should be a piece of cake.
She doesn't really need to butter me up... but she'll be a lot happier if the rest of you are, too.
You know I'm just saving the best for later, milady.
Oh... I like the one where I have to save you after your transformation's run out and you were in the shower before...
Aww... and I thought you'd want to look at Adrien instead...
Well... I'd be some partner if I just let you lose without giving you something you really want to look at, right?
If you're going to bargain, shouldn't you be more dressed, milady?
Bugaboo, I can't see a single way this game ends poorly unless an actual Akuma appears.
Bold words, Marinette! But... let's just see who's still standing at the end of this!
You wouldn't love me if I were that much of a pushover. I'm still keeping things interesting, aren't I?
I love it when you get flustered like this.
I don't know how you bumble your way into the most attractive way of saying things... or how you can be both so competent and so clumsy. Either way...
『{plagg}Do you ever worry that your partner's a huge weirdo?{!reset}』 I don't really get it either. Sometimes it's best to just let her ramble and come to her senses.
I'll... take you out for dinner after this? 『{plagg}Ah, the way to a girl or a Kwami's heart: food!{!reset}』 When in doubt, it rarely fails...
I did do you a favor by taking off more than one thing earlier. Maybe not the best call when I was suited up... but admit you're a little relieved, won't you, bugaboo?
I had thought you were just acting really well when I tossed my staff away early. But... I do have another one of those, too.
They're certainly one of my favorite places to rest my head. After your thighs. And between them.
Function over form, milady. And I know how to make them function very well. That's always in style.
Marinette, wait, be careful what you're--
Milady-- Marinette, you should... ah--
I won't make you say what you're thinking... but I wouldn't mind.
I guess the surprise's more for everyone else tonight then, isn't it?
『{plagg}He talks about her a lot, too, Tikki, but maybe he's just more polite because he knows I'm listening...{!reset}』 You continue to flatter me, milady.
Marinette, you're welcome to get started whenever you'd like. I'm just flattered you find me so... desirable. 『{plagg}Tikki, these two are endlessly entertaining! Live a little!{!reset}』
I'm happy considering this a win for both of us. We're having fun, or at least I am!
Whether we win the game or lose, I think we're both having fun. And that's a win.
This is really it, isn't it? Come on-- or... ahaha~!
Well, I'm not done just yet... you'll know when I am, as you usually do!
I can let you win next time. But... this is fun in its own way, right, Bugaboo?
It's... w-well, I can always lose my mask if you want me to. It's not like there's really secrets between us... um...
Isn't she wonderful, everyone? Gracious in defeat, impressive in victory.
I really know you love me if you can keep it up this long, milady.
Oui, with pleasure.
Oh, don't think for a second I'd just leave you there like that without letting you watch, milady!
I could say the same about you... almost.
I certainly don't mind the attention, Marinette.
I'll take that as a compliment.
Well, I'd say I'm svelte more than slim.
I'm so glad you took the initiative to say what I was thinking too. I'm jealous of your hair, though.
Good taste is universal, and I'm not just saying that because you're exceedingly beautiful.
Welll... if you're so curious, maybe you should keep making me lose, non?
Appreciate the compliment, Yang...
Well... it does help to know a local who can guide you around, Sayaka.
A common stereotype, but there's lots of places to enjoy, at a reasonable price, Sayaka!
Well, I am. Any chance I can make it a bit better for you, Sayaka?
It's hard not to, considering the circumstances, Sayaka.
Goodness. As one of the few magical boys, I hope you're not assuming I need rescuing..
Well, most magical girls are pretty imaginative, don't you think? I think you can imagine me in all kinds of dangerous scenarios!
It's more than it's fair share of challenges, sometimes. But it's always worth it.
It... well. It can be tough to manage.
If you're that excited, you're welcome to just ask, Sayaka.
I'm sure you will soon... but I'm not sure you'll be all that excited.
I don't mind but... there is certainly a first time for everything, hm?
Well... this is a first?
Big, handsome guy with the charming Southern drawl?
I've actually really come around to Camembert on a fresh brioche.
Well, I've got kind of a thing with this girl…
Uh… that's not a great question.
Not that it's your business, but… my mom and dad were always pretty busy.
I wear cologne, yes…
Yep. Can’t get enough of bluenettes, if I’m being honest, and I am.
Always. Are you, uhm, asking me out?
Well, yeah. Plagg, you want to explain it?
It's kinda weird to call me that after I've transformed...
Chat as in... oh, oui, your viewers. Not Chat Noir Chat. Well, thanks. I don't think I'd qualify as “popular,” really…
Let's see what you can do, Ringo!
You better be careful, miss, or you might end up being the one bent over a table.
Oh, if we're doing spankings tonight, I'd be happy to give you a turn, miss. You've got a lot to admire.
Well, I can be a good submissive kitty if you want, miss, but I'd rather be giving you something to think about instead.
I get that a lot. But, you'll find I'm a lot better at giving a spanking than receiving one.
Absolutely! That's me. And Ladybug. We're the Defenders of Paris. And I do really love my city.
You've got it, Shouko. Fighting crime by night, keeping up a mysterious day job... all for the love of Paris.
It can be stressful, but you get used to it.
It's true, it can be a lot sometimes, Shouko. But it has its perks.
I'm one of a kind, Perona. But you can definitely enjoy the view.
You're welcome to apurr-eciate me, Perona.
I'm sure you'll find me a bit more exciting when I cross your path, at least, Ringo.
Well, I like to stand out in my own way, Ringo.
I have a lot of really good friends from high school and college... but it does make it hard to judge people's intentions sometimes.
A little bit. It's a bit hard to trust people. You wonder if they're just looking at you because you're famous, or they want something from you with nothing back... but I do have really good friends.
Tell you what: You can take whatever I'm about to take off home with you. Sound good, Polly?
I-I'm really flattered. But, I suppose so. It does mean that my package isn't always where I want it, though.
Oh um. I don't really... use drugs. I like to be a good example to the people who look up to me.
Well... Polly... I do have to work tomorrow. But... I wouldn't mind finding somewhere quiet to dance with you.
Well... I'm a fan of making my own luck.
That's such a shame. I've got quite the appetite. And Plagg can enjoy a snack of his own, too.
Oh, it's typical for me. But if you find it rather thrilling, by all means.
Well, it is rather thrilling, but it's pretty common for me.
You're not kitten around with me, are you, Ms. Fortune?
It's Fortunate, Ms, that I'm not kitten around with you.
Hm... Are you thinking of calling me later? I would never claim you're easy, though.
『{plagg}If you really want to know, he trims his pubic hair, and isn't "cut". He also is very active--{!reset}』 Plagg, maybe leave some surprises for her?
『{plagg}He likes being tied up and pegged. He's very loud, actually. Super distracting.{!reset}』 Plagg--! She... Well. Let's save some surprises for her.
Hey, if I've stolen your heart already, I'd say that's a different kind of burglar.
I'm more about stealing hearts or saving the day than thievery.

state.text: Not bad, Rouge. I know you've seen a few things, but that was astute. 『{plagg}Didn't we basically tell her that, already? Are you distracted by her... {!reset}』

case.state: Well, it's not that simple, but I do keep myself pretty busy with modeling. Long-term, I think I'll stick with heroics.
I think I'll stick with heroing for as long as I can, but modeling pays the bills. And sure, it pays them well, but...
Well, having a partner you love is always pretty great, right?
Winning the love of someone who means the world to you has... well, I think it's something I've always needed more than wanted.
She's something special. And... well, I've never shown what you might get to see later...
It's nice to be appreciated. You see any bad guys, and I'll take care of them. Though, if there's any bad girls, that's also in my repertoire.
Plain good looking, maybe, Mari. I hope you enjoy a little bit of showing off. You'll show off for me later, right?
You say that like it's such a bad thing. Haven't you heard of a tease, Mari?
I'm plenty confident, just more subtle. I can't say I don't like attention, but I hope you don't mind if I get to relax a bit out of costume, Mari.
A lot of scheduling. It helps to pick up skills quickly, and then pretend to be a little dumb and exhausted. It opens a lot of doors and lot of time, Mari.
I'm kind of relieved you've never heard of me. I do some modeling. Here and there. Nothing big.
It can be a sex thing if you want, Hilda.
There was a long time I really didn't, and I did it just for my father... but I think it's something that's part of me I've really reclaimed as my own!
Well, I wouldn't want the police to deal with supervillains. That'd just be unfair. Call it my civic duty.
Well, sure, but it's a lot easier when you're immune to harm, move faster, and can fight off supervillains.
Well, I'm of the opinion I can make anything look good, Kaz.
We do have a few friends who we do things like that with, but... it can get kind of messy. There's one man and one woman who we both regularly see, but that's about it.
Well, I'm not here to stay dressed, am I? I'm flattered you're so excited to see all of me.
Well, I'm sure you're more familiar with other kitties, Nami.
Well, my name is Cat Noir.
I can't say I dislike a lady that can talk to my Kwami well. 『{plagg}She's nice. Any chance we can keep spending time with her? {!reset}』
『{plagg}Oh! I like this one! Adrien, let her get me some cheese, pleeeease?{!reset}』 Well... she just said she can't feed you, Plagg, but that doesn't mean I don't appreciate the kindness.
Goodness. As one of the few magical boys, I hope you're not assuming I need rescuing..
Well, most magical girls are pretty imaginative, don't you think? I think you can imagine me in all kinds of dangerous scenarios!
Just a bit jealous it's not you, Sayaka. In the latex, or out of it.
Hm... just wishing it were you. In the latex, or about to lose.
Well, I am. Any chance I can make it a bit better for you, Sayaka?
It's hard not to, considering the circumstances, Sayaka.
It's more than it's fair share of challenges, sometimes. But it's always worth it.
It... well. It can be tough to manage.
Well... it does help to know a local who can guide you around, Sayakai.
A common stereotype, but there's lots of places to enjoy, at a reasonable price, Sayaka!
Well... ridiculous by whose metrics?
I don't mind taking off my shirt... not with all the hard work I do on this figure.
If you're that excited, you're welcome to just ask, Sayaka.
I'm sure you will soon... but I'm not sure you'll be all that excited.
I don't mind but... there is certainly a first time for everything, hm?
Well... this is a first?
...I happen to like how my costume looks.
Oh, yeah? I'm normally into the kitty ears, mysefl.
Having some complex feelings about that, Sheena?
I could, but that'd hardly get you wet, don't you think?
I'm a superhero, Takatoshi. Is that so hard to believe?
Ah, looks like my time's up. This'll be pretty quick, Takatoshi, actually.
『{plagg}My loyalty can be bought with cheese... {!reset}』 Plagg and I have been through just about everything together. He's a bit interesting, but I'd trust him with my life, and I have.
I am a model, but I get the feeling that you've got an eye for quality then?
Well, well... Don't you have an eye for quality, Taka? I'm a model, but...
Quite a few things, actually. Incredible agility, and the power to destroy anything. Durability to pain and damage... You know, the usual superhero stuff.
So, ready to see if your imagination's imagining correctly?
Do you imagine you imagined correctly?

state.text: 『{plagg}Hm... Did you know if you rub my tummy after I've eaten delicious cheese, I'll start purring?{!reset}』 Doesn't everyone?
If you can get Plagg to act sweet, I'll owe you, Perona. 『{plagg}I could rest under your chin and purr while you read, Perona... and can sample any cheeses you have, to keep me purring!{!reset}』

case.state: Would you believe me if I told you I've charmed a few villains into giving up without a fight? Not without a struggle, at least later, though...
Looks go beyond character. But sometimes... well, opposites attract explosively.
Oh? Are you worried I can't keep up with you? Maybe you'd like someone a little bit more powerful than quick, mrow?
I'm plenty flexible. But let's say I have the best of both worlds.
Oh? Are you going to pounce on me?
I'd be almost upset if I didn't get you purring.

state.text: I usually model fully dressed, so this'll be a bit different... But you aren't totally wrong, Rarity.
I hope nobody minds if I slow things down a bit. You've gotten to see a lot of me the last couple rounds, haven't you?

case.state: Well... it's what you do with things, not how big they are... And it has pleased a crowd on its own, you know...
Looks like you finally got me.
Well, I am a graceful winner.
Ooo... bad luck for me.
I'm not just swishing my tail. You'll get to see something good this time.
Well, time for a magic trick!
Well... check me out. Seriously, you'll love this!

state.text: This almost feels rude to be winning by this much. 『{plagg}Why? It's their fault for not playing better.{!reset}』
So... I do want to win, but if this isn't fun for the rest of you... 『{plagg}You're thinking too hard about this. What kind of hero just gives up because the other people are sad? Not you!{!reset}』

case.state: I should probably give you all a better view... 『{plagg}Yeah! I mean... wait, no, I don't want you to lose! What would that do to our friendship if I had to watch you jerk off?! {!reset}』
I'm ahead... but if I take more more off, I might distract the rest of you.
Well, I'm winning, so as much as I'd like to play nice...
I don't want to get overconfident. Arrogance isn't becoming, and I do want to be coming later.
『{plagg}Ooo... Adrien, you're still winning?{!reset}』 Don't taunt them, Plagg.
『{plagg}Do you think you could try a little less hard? It's so boring when you're good at everything.{!reset}』 I'm not trying to lose... I'm just doing my best!
『{plagg}You've been winning for a while, do you have your next thing picked?{!reset}』 Not quite... well...
I think I've kept you waiting long enough.
Well... it's no fun to win if you don't make some friends.
I've been enjoying the views.... I think it's only fair to share, huh?
As much fun as I'm having... I think we're all going to enjoy this next part.
Well... I'm not famously an underwear model. But... I am a model.
I'm still ahead... but this is really close! Mind if I get a little closer?
Well... there goes my last advantage.
You really kept this game close!
This has been really close. So... I guess we've all been looking forward to this.
Looks like this'll be a tough challenge. Don't worry, I'm always up to the test.
Ooo... it's already so close, and I haven't even taken off my belt yet. Speaking of...
Unfortunately, the suit doesn't come off in parts, so keep this a secret!
I'm a cat of my word. That said, I'm about to be a lot less costumed.

state.text: Lot of cute people here tonight... 『{plagg}The world is your charcuterie plate! ...Or at least the cheeses. At least at this place.{!reset}』
『{plagg}So... who are you stripping for this turn, Adrien? Don't fixate so much on Ladybug, have some fun!{!reset}』 I haven't really thought about that, but everyone is pretty... pretty.

case.state: I'm not far ahead, but I'm also not far behind. So, I think I can make you wait a bit.
I guess the shoe's on the other foot... so why don't I take mine off?
I might not be suited up, but it's bad luck if you think I'll get naked just because.
Well, you almost have me onto the stuff I don't usually model... but...
Well, time for your bragging rights.
I guess it is getting kind of hot. Thought that might be the rest of you watching me.
The game's close! But... I think this next part should help me regain my lead.
If you like looking now... think of what I'll look like next!
I'm not out, yet... but I guess I'm about to be out in one way or another.
I guess it's really time. At least it was pretty close, right?
I know I'm bad luck... but I can't believe I'm losing already...
Wait-- did I get tricked? I'm already losing?
...Hmph. I guess I'm already behind? Really?
Oh... I lost and I'm out of time. Great.
Well... that's perfect timing. Looks like I'm out of power.
Oh-- right. I used my Cataclysm before I got here... so...
This really isn't going my way...
I'm not used to losing, but I guess I don't mind that much...
Well, if you want to see me strip that badly...
Win some, lose some, I guess.
I'm pretty used to not getting what I want, so this is fine as long as it makes the rest of you happy.
If you wanted to see me naked, you didn't have to stack the deck this much.
This is going pretty well, I think. Aside from me losing.
Even when you lose, it's not so bad.
I'm a little flattered.
Come on, I'm a model. You think this bothers me?
Now this part is easy.
At least I know people're going to enjoy this.
Ah... the part where you get to see where I get all that confidence from!
Well... no sense in making you wait.
O-oh! Okay... then.
Well... I have to keep my Miraculous... so...
There's only one way to find out, right? And that's fine. Sometimes you need to try new things... anything new you think you can show me?
Don't worry, Bugaboo. I think of what you look like naked even if I can already pretty much tell.
Honesty, and a lot of practice makes the difference. What do you think, Bugaboo?
Well... we're a bit more experienced than you, but you're off to a great start. If you like what we have... you can definitely get there in time, Shouko.
I get the feeling you're looking for more than someone to flirt with for tonight. I have a girlfriend, you have a boyfriend, all four of us enjoy this kind of thing...
I'm interested in watching you play some piano. Or, if I'm being honest, with yourself.
...Since you asked, though... you're not exactly my type. But you're artistic, talented, fun, and honest. If I were to find my way underneath you tonight, I'd say that's a pretty big win.
Though... I think you'd fit even better between Bugaboo and I. That way she's not left out, wouldn't you say?
I won't say anything more if you don't want me too, milady. But she's right, you know. Whether as lovers, or partners. I'm glad we're together.
I wouldn't want those types of people to be my fans... but it's better for me if nobody starts rumors... if you can keep a secret, we can have more fun tonight...
I don't know... Bugaboo can be a bit jealous, can't you?
Honestly... As long as everyone's having fun... It's a great way to enjoy each other, and learn a little bit along the way.
I can't complain. I'm... more into both sexes than Marinette is... but that doesn't mean we both can't have fun.
I'm lucky enough to have someone like that already. So, sure, there's always more to enjoy, but I wouldn't say there's anything I'm missing.
I'm already lucky that way. She's not here tonight, but she'll always be there for me when I need her.
I've already got the important things I want, anyway. She really is that special. And we both trust each other, even if there's obviously some secrets and strangeness here and there...
Not bad, not bad...

Well... It's a little different for me than it'd be for you, unless you're interested in anal play? It feels... like being held. It's dangerous, but intimate, so the trust is just... the physical sensation can't even compare to the trust...
I wouldn't worry too much if I were you, Meia. I've... just run out of magic.
It looks like I've run out of magic... while that's a shame... um... I don't think you're liable to be offended.
Don't worry about it, Cagliostro, but I think you're about to meet another friend of mine!
That's not a really funny joke--!
We're not fooling anyone at this point, so we may as well talk about fooling around.
Let me get undressed, and I'd be happy to take care of you. Like usual.
Milady...
I'm glad you still find me interesting. Even if what I'm doing isn't.
...I'd be happy to do that when the game is over... but right now feels a bit hard...
....We definitely can, in a bit...
Mmm... are you sure you don't want me to draw this out...? Make a strip tease out of it?
As you wish, milady.
I'll send Plagg away, milady. Don't worry. Besides, hasn't Tikki seen me naked before, anyway?
Don't worry, Bugaboo. I'll send Plagg away in just a second.
Well, thanks. Now, if I get whacked by a villain, you can at least know my final thoughts were about your butt.
As if your butt wasn't distracting enough...
You're always mine, milady... but if you wanted to be someone else's for a bit, I can't say I wouldn't be excited...
Well... of course, milady. But if you want someone else... you know I don't mind. I think I'll be a bit, so if you wanted...
M-Marinette...
I'm... well, now I'm not going to be able to focus on my cards, milady--
Don't worry, milady! I'm sure we're going to win this free and clear.
Oh, come on! It's hardly fun if we take out Deadly Dealer without some drama!
Camembert. That's what you're smelling, everyone, not my feet.
I swear it's not my feet, everyone. Plagg just really likes stinky cheese.
You didn't forget that I model professionally, did you?
I know my good looks are distracting, but you didn't really forget, did you?
I'm going to include the staff here, you know. It wouldn't do if I didn't try to keep you company if you lose, milady.
Well, I know I got lucky the time you lost. So... just to show there's no hard feelings, I'll toss my staff too, Bugaboo.
There's this Boulangerie-Patiessiere right across from where I went to high school. Sometimes I think I get a whiff of from you, Ladybug.
I think Plagg has a point. Maybe since you've got the power of creation, you're more into baking... perhaps during your spare time?
And to think, all the times I rescued Marinette, it was really Ladybug in my arms...
I know you'll have my back always, Bugaboo. But... it's no fun if only one of us is dressed up.
She's always a lot more gentle than Plagg whenever I've had to transform with her. I think she's allowed to be a little upset.
All this means is that Plagg can be sweet, if Tikki can be sour on occasion. I don't think that's so bad.
So you're like this in card games too...? I guess the stakes are pretty high.
Well... if I knew you were going to get so competitive, I'd probably have played a bit more seriously.
You say that like i didn't just break pace with you.
I think Marinette is becoming more Ladybug. I can't say I mind...
Well, I can't fault your enthusiasm, but it's only my belt for now, anyway...
I appreciate the applause, Marinette, but it's just my belt...
Of course I can handle it. In case you'd forgotten, I am Cat Noir.
I'm Cat Noir. I can handle a little bit of destruction and bad luck, bugaboo.
If I didn't know better, I'd think you tried to match me. So, only fair that we're dressed pretty similarly.
Well, fate or accident, I think you and I aren't dressed too dissimilarly, milady. But I do think every layer you have left to lose is a lot more compelling than mine.
I can wear a bra next time. You can find something I'd look cute in, don't you think?
You can choose not to wear one, milady. I wouldn't mind. I don't think anyone else here would be terribly offended, either.
You're not a fool to me, milady...
Milady, I'm sure I can make it up to you...
I wouldn't mind if you stared as Ladybug... you're welcome to look as Marinette, too. I know I'm easy on the eyes. You're just admitting it now.
Bugaboo, you can say nothing. That works sometimes, too. I can tell plenty by where you're looking.
I'd better hurry up and listen to the fashion director, then, shouldn't I?
Well... that's quite the endorsement for me to hurry up, isn't it?
I'd say no, but have you talked to Chloe lately? Some people never learn.
I think wanting attention as much as you want to give it is pretty fair...
I like that you can get into a game, no matter what the game is.
Considering the stakes here... I'm certainly interested in saving you, milady.
Um... this is... sort of a weird time, Marinette. But... since you brought it up...
I... well, if you're trying to distract me, it's working, Marinette... since you brought it up, though...
You're welcome to be a bit more explicit, milady... what would you like me to do for you?
Innuendo is fine, but this is the perfect game to be explicit, don't you think?
If you'd asked, I'd have been happy to join you...
Well, I'm not perfect, but I hope you know I think you're perfect for me, milady...
And to think, usually you're the one pressing me down.
I hear you, I hear you. My suit's coming off soon and then we can talk about all kinds of presses.
Well, Plagg could still use Cataclysm if you wanted, you know?
Plagg's still here... so if you need a Cataclysm I'm sure he could be convinced...
Well, it helps that you make me want to look good for you.
I hope you'll like the next look even more... but I always appreciate it when you compliment me, bugaboo.
You're having a lot of fun, aren't you? But... I find it flattering you still wear that vintage piece.
I'm not sure taking it off at the end makes sense... but I'm glad you still like that jacket enough to wear it.
Someone's got you worked up tonight... and it seems like it's not just me.
It's cute when she's flustered, isn't she, ~player~? I wonder what we could do to keep her off-balance... it's the only way I think I can win!
Hm... if you're trying to distract me, it's working... I can't stop thinking about you and...
Well, if that's an invitation, I'd like to explore that...
Hey! That's a pretty strong claim considering I'm winning!
As if Cat Noir isn't saving Ladybug just as often these days... you're funny.
As if the view weren't distracting, now you're going to try dirty talk?
Ahem... I... I see.
You're an easy person to love. But... winning at a game and getting to see you naked is hard to beat.
You're not a mess, you're just creatively organized. I think we could do some of that in bed tonight, too.
It's nice to see this side of you. All sides of you are nice but... you dissolve wondrously, milady.
Well, if you don't want to get dirty, stay out of the kitchen, right? Or the strip poker game.
It's my fault. And... I think you've known for a while, if I had to guess.
That's okay, milady... I think you deserve to know by now.
Thank you, Ladybug... but I'm happy to help if it means you can still keep your mask on.
This isn't all that big of a deal to me... but I really, really do appreciate the praise, milady.
I-- zut-- I can't believe I--
I wish I'd won, but... it's only fair if you look...
I don't think we should worry too much now, milady. It'll be nice to meet you as, well, me...
...Yeah, the Akuma... I guess we don't really need to worry now.
Y-you really think so?
I... well, I do like it when you do that. But... maybe sometimes it's more fun with Ladybug...
Plagg, claws in-- Hey!
Hey! Detransforme moi! Claws out, claws in is way cooler! Just wait for Plagg to show up!
...Don't worry, everyone. Marinette just gets this way sometimes.
...It's actually pretty flattering, but I think you can just say that we're okay with bringing other people in...
Don't worry, milady. I'm here for you, even as a civilian.
Plagg, claws in. Don't worry, Bugaboo. I'll always have your back...
Handsome, cute, whatever you want to call them, milady. But... I'm just surprised you didn't look this morning!
Is today the only time you've not watched me get dressed?
Well, I find myself agreeing with you, though I do think we could drop the act here, too...
I think we can drop the act, milady.
You're terribly confident for a woman who's only about to match me...
You're surprisingly confident for having your chest out, Marinette.
Claws in. Did you just call me Adrien? Pfft.
Did you just call me Adrien...?
Well... you always manage to impress me, so... I figured I'd see where you'd take it from here.
Oh, I don't mind! I'm... just encouraged, is all.
Tsk. I guess it's hard to keep a secret after taking care of yourself...
Oh? Is it my turn to pick?
If you're going to save me, maybe you should put that to words, don't you think?
If you want, maybe you could tell me a bit about how you'd be... saving me?
You're really going to draw this out, aren't you?
A little help, milady? ...Well, more than just talking, at least?
Marinette, didn't you want to play this game? Don't get so...
Well... I can't think of any good reason you shouldn't look. But... I think that includes everyone here, Marinette.
All eyes on me, but I hope you don't mind if I keep my mind on Marinette.
Well, milady, enjoy the view.
M-Marinette...!
I don't like it when anyone criticizes you, so I'd prefer to keep my judgments to myself.
Well... if it makes you happy, I wouldn't mind...
Marinette... you always get so shy about this...
You see me as Cat Noir. Just because I'm about to be naked doesn't mean I'm suddenly braver.
You say that like I'm not courageous every day, milady.
...As long as Marinette's happy, I'm happy.
Bugaboo, I don't think you need to threaten people... unless you're threatening to touch me, in which case go right ahead.
I thought Cat Noir was the one with puns... I can't say I mind, thought.
If you think puns are going to get me going... you're right, milady!
I'm glad you've come around on it, milady.
I'm glad it feels fun and not... unusual, milady.
Are you trying to distract me? No fair... though I definitely wouldn't mind that...
H-hold on!
Hold out just a little longer, milady.
Don't worry, Marinette... we have all the time in the world.
Well... who did you have in mind? You know it can be a man or a woman, right?
I don't think it's a problem, but... you lost, so which of us should get to pick?
I'd like to believe I'm a fine specimen of masculinity and refinement, but I admire a strong woman, too.
It's true that I'm not big and bulky... but the best muscle a man can have is a thoughtful mind. A quick tongue helps too.
You're doing great, Ringo.
I promise to make it up to you, Ringo. I might even take requests...
You're doing great, Ringo. Honestly, just being yourself... especially naked? That's great flirting.
Since you've been thinking about it, Ringo... here you go.
A few fun ones, if that's what you're asking?
I'm a pretty good actor. You'd be surprised.
It's nice to be appreciated.
I've got a lot of that to go around, but I hope you're not trying to take all of it.
Huh? No, just that you don’t mind being a top or a bottom.
They remind me of bugaboo. You know, Ladybug.
...I'll take that as a no but… it's actually pretty hard to keep up.
...It's not the best smell… but Plagg loves it, and it just tastes so good.
She's strong, and focused, and creative, and kind, and… well, maybe if it were her idea…
Can you ask me literally anything else? Weird sex stuff? Personal secrets?
“It converts negative emotional energy into destructive force! It causes just about everything to crumble. And, no! It'd totally kill them!”
I feel like Cat Noir and Adrien Agreste are two different people sometimes.
No, no, let’s stick to English.
Well… maybe a few without my shirt on, but it was mostly marketed towards boys my age…
Well, I kinda did that for my dad too…
Um… Maybe I forgot some Camembert in my pocket.
For bad guys, or for when I'm done undressing tonight? If you feel like being a bad girl, you don't have to be sneaky for me.
I'm keeping my eyes out for all kinds of things, Mari. If you're trying to distract me, though, that'd be a shame.
Well, what could be more exciting than a superhero?
I really hope you aren't going to ask me for my Miraculous...
I'm not quite sure how useful my ~clothing~ will be, but... I'm sure you can wear it, or barter it. This stuff tends to be pretty... valuable.
I meant that more about my... well, everything. But I could certainly find somewhere for my other package tonight.
It's... well. I think if you're happy, and it's not going to hurt you, that's fine. I just want to not do that.
Well... We could do more than dance... any suggestions? I have a few ideas... but they might get you covered in something more than sweat and glitter.
