...But since you asked, I think the worst that could happen would be both of us going home unsatisfied.
Hm... being a ghost without having a supermodel able to go down on you seem sort of like a waste, don't you think?
Plagg's incredibly special. I won't let it go to his head, but I'll make sure to feed him some extra cheese later, and credit it to you, Rouge.
Like I said, it's only a rumor... But there was once a villain who was Akumatized due to... complex frustrations regarding a paramour. Her powers revolved around inducing insatiable lust...
You don't need to go that far, unless you're really that interested in being tied up and you're ready to ask for forgiveness... or not.
I think you meant I look even better when I undress, right, Ringo?
I don't think you need to be jealous, Shouko. I didn't have my first friend until I was fourteen or fifteen, so I haven't had that much longer than you, especially if you start now.
They really are. I think the types of friends you're willing to... I guess, even share your body with? Those are... well, not much closer you can get, right?
Well, since you asked... you can take as much of a look as you like. Even touch it, if you want?
I've wondered about that on occasion too, Critical Darling...
Well... that's making it worth my while, Jessie. Anything?

That's really true. I just like the fact that it pays well, I get to travel... all the clothes I could want. It doesn't hurt that it means if I can do it, other average-looking guys feel empowered, too.

I get all kinds of clothes, I get to travel, and it's hard to complain about the money. There's hard parts, sure, but I love doing it. It... also means that average-looking guys like me know that they can really do whatever they set their mind to.
Well, you already know the big secret, Shouko. But... I guess it's just what I've always done.
I wouldn't say there's a secret... just practice. And I've practiced a long time. Well, I guess there is a secret, but you know my big secret.
...You know, I guess you could say my father chose it for me. He's left me with a lot of responsibilities, both as a citizen and as a hero.
...It helped that my father was a fashion designer. But I wouldn't say that... Well, I love my father. But he's left me with a lot of... well. Challenges or opportunities to make things better.
That's too kind. Sure, we've gotten into some close calls, but... Tonight I think I'd rather get closer to something, or someone else.
I think I can get a lot closer to some people in this game than I ever got into danger.

Well... I have a friend who took a long time to come around. We have similar backgrounds, and when she was younger, she was... well, kind of a brat. We fought a lot. But... now she's a lot more interested in using her privileges to help others. Sometimes, anyway.

Hm... I know a girl with a similar family situation. She really struggles with other people, but she tries her best. I think, in some ways, even being friends with people is something she wants to compete over, but only to make sure she knows you're valued, and to be your best self.

My best friend, Nino, is a really great guy. My upbringing was... Well. I'm glad he was so persistent in befriending me. And just being a lot of fun, even though we're pretty different, he never treated me like I was this distant guy, you know?

Ah, good question. Nino, my best friend is the kind of guy who can really... Well, push past your shell, if you know what I mean? He's never pushy, but he always sweeps you up in the ideas he has, and most of them revolve around partying and music. He's never led me astray, but always tries to help me feel, well, normal.

Well, one of my favorite friends was one of my first friends. She was kind of a jerk growing up, but she's gotten a lot better. It's kind of funny. She started off with more advantages than anyone, but I'm mostly just proud of her for growing into a person who cares for others. Even if sometimes it's just so she'll have attention.

Hm... I know a world-famous fencer. She's an incredibly hard worker, even when it comes to her friendships. Something I really admire about her is that she always does her best, especially when it's something she's bad at.

I know this is hard to believe, but I really struggle with technology. Maybe it's all the magic I'm used to, but I don't know where I'd be without my pal Max. He's always the smartest guy in the room, and maybe a little cocky, but his brain's always thinking of ways to make things better for other people.

One of my friends, Kim is... Well. Let's just say his best muscles are the ones you can see. His heart's really strong for both athletics and the people in his life, though. Sometimes, it's nice to have a friend who makes you go for it, rather than overthink it, you know?

I like music and playing piano, especially. But one of my friends, Luka, is just such a prodigy. I think I might have more people see me in magazines, but he deserves to be listened to way more. He's so... Ah... you know. He's just amazing.

I think one of my... Well. His name is Luka and... we were sort of rivals. But... I think we both bring a lot of great things to the table, and life's easier when you're happy knowing you can bring them at the same time, if that makes sense?

Part of the challenge of... Well, being famous... Is you'll have certain people who try to use your fame to fill something that's missing in themselves. I have a friend who took a lot of time to be a real friend... But being honest about who you are, and knowing you're safe to be honest with others... that can take a kind of friendship too, I guess.

When I think of friends... Ah, this is going to sound super elitist, but my bodyguard growing up was definitely more like a friendly uncle than a friend. It's sort of amazing the lessons you can learn from quiet people. I think that's something I like about you, Shouko. You make me feel really safe and listened to.
Oh? Well, curiosity killed the cat...
Like you said, though... it's worth showing off, just a bit.
Would you like that? Getting good and stretched out, Nadia?
It's okay, though. I still really like it, but now I just do it for me. The paycheck's nice, and I can be honest with my fans. At least... more honest.
Well... When you put it that way, Rouge... I guess I'll just have to make sure.
Unfortunately, that seems to be the case... Claws in.
Looks like my time's up... Claws in. Don't worry, Nami, it's not falling apart forever or anything...
I'm getting out-punned! What a tragedy!
Ah, zut. I wanted a comeback for this...
I'll have you know, Sayaka, that as one of the magical boys the world keeps at a premium, we keep it simple.
Woulld a suit, tie, mask, and cape make it easier for you, Sayaka?
I guess one of us needs to feel a bit hotter in the process...
Maybe you're just more accustomed to feeling hotter during this step, hm, Sayaka?
Well... sure. But It's fine if I have fun in an interdimensional space now and then, right?
I guess so. But it'd be pretty hard to believe a model was actually defeating evil in his off time, right?
...That's right. I wouldn't really... you know, talk about that, elsewhere.
Ah... yes. Not exactly subtle, like this, am I?
You know, there are plenty of affordable places to explore in Paris. Let me know if you need help, Sayaka!
It does help to have a local guide. If you wanted to come check out the city, I'd be happy to make a recommendation.
W-well, I can't say I do mind dressing up in... well...
I do really enjoy... a wide variety of clothes...
...Until tonight, nobody, truth be told, Sayaka...
I guess I'd prefer this secret stay betwen us...
There's all manner of ways to make a tasteful nude calendar...
Your concerns about my fashion sense are appreciated but unwarranted, Hilda.
Ah... earlier than I'd wanted, but I'm okay.
The cat part more, or the burglar part, Marceline?
Well, I am a pretty smooth operator...
Nothing of the sort. But... if you were interested...
Only if you're also a pervert.
Real superhero, Taka. In the flesh, spandex, latex, and magic leather.
It's a lot easier than it looks, but... Like I said, superhero.
I find that direct compliments go a lot farther than machismo, Takatoshi.
You know, if you like what you see, you can be honest. Don't worry so much, Takatoshi.
Though I am rather fur-ocious.
Though, maybe you're confusing my fur-ocity for something else.
Perona, the trend, if you're interested, might be called nekomimi.
I know I'm unique. But asking for catboys or nekomimis... might to be your liking.
Ah... well, I would if I could've... but unfortunately, these are the rules...
I'd stall the game out for you, Perona, but unfortunately...
Sorry, Perona... That'd, uh, be up to the Guardian. We need him in our world.
I'm sure he'd be well cared for... but I'm going to have to say no to that. It'd be the Guardian's responsibility to assign him.
I hate to tell you to wait, but I'm sure you want to enjoy all of me, hm?
Don't you think you'd have more fun if I were all the way naked? Or maybe you're ready for me to just get to work?
You know, I wasn't born yesterday. Are you just trying to figure out how to mug me later?
Hey... Wait a second. Are you trying to make a mark of me?
I'm a pretty classy, subtle person. Don't catnap on the opportunity to get to know me better.
If you're interested in some subterfuge, you're welcome to keep flirting though. I am a mastery of subtlety.
...Keep up the flirting and you might get to two-something spread me.
Is that true for fashion shoots, or seduction too, Rarity?
It sounds like you're not usually getting a lot of one on one time with your models, Rarity.
Lucky for you, my tail comes off. Nice and big removal, right?
I'll take off something suuuper big and impactful. How about my belt?
Plagg, claws in!
Detransforme moi.
Claws in! Don't worry, I'm plenty hot, but not actually on fire.
Hey, you got to see Cat Noir reveal his secret identity. I think I'm entitled to a few small things.
These shoes are pretty timeless... but I hope you all know I'm not doing this to stall.
I guess it's fine if I give you something a little big... or is that an oxymoron?
I'm still pretty toasty from wearing my costume. But... also from being in a strong, winning position. I hope this'll do.
As much as I want to prove Plagg wrong... which isn't very hard... my belt has to come off first. I'm a gentleman. I tuck my shirts in.
My shirt's tucked in, so the belt has to come off first.
I'm sure you're all really invested in my shirt coming off, but... has to be my belt first.
As much as I'd like to say I don't have a gym routine, running around rooftops is a great daily workout.
I do work hard to look this good. Moisturizing, saving people, being judged on my appearance...
So... even with that in mind...
I'm happy with my underwear but...
I know this is my last item, but...
So, I hope everyone's very clear that it's not what you have, it's how you use it.
Well, that's fine. I'll just start with my belt.
I thought this was going to be a friendly game of cards, but if you're going to push me, you'll find that this kitty's got claws!
This isn't really how I wanted this to go, but it's the big reveal you're all clamoring for...
So uh... it goes without saying what happens at the ~background~ stays at the ~background~, right?
I guess this'll do.
Hold your applause. I know you want more.
I think I can hold out just a little longer.
I know, I know. They're shoes. You'll get the rest if I keep playing like this.
...At least it's something small. It's not like you're going to spank me with this belt.
It's a small thing, sure, but think of all that you can do with a belt... you can keep your pants up, restrain someone...
Losing the game does bug me a bit. And not in the good, Ladybug way.
A compliment would be nice to hear about now.
...In all seriousness, I'm a little insecure, but I work really hard, you know?
...I'm... not the biggest, but I try my best.
I'm losing my underwear, but I won't lose my dignity.
Well... here I go!
I'm glad we're thinking the same thing, Mari.
I'd hate to volunteer her... but this does sound lke fun.
To see you and her together... oui.
Plagg's pretty special too, obviously. But Ladybug is... Well, she's really, really special to me.
But... Well, you can tell that Ladybug and I are on really good terms too. I don't know what I'd do without her or Plagg.
Marinette's my favorite, but I always have room for new friends. She's always going to be the first person in my life, though.
I think it's pretty... Well, obvious, that Marinette's always going to come first for me. But I think we always both have more room for more friends.
I can spend all night complimenting you... but I have a feeling you'd rather me use my lips for something else. I can see a few options. Mind if I try them all?
Though, maybe we could work together, if you don't mind showing me where to put my fingers to make you sing?
Though, you know, if you're worried about your boyfriend getting jealous, you could always have him enjoy me, too.
The ground rules are pretty simple... Nothing longterm besides friendship, both of us make sure you have a great experience, and nobody leaves without anything but satisfaction.
Don't worry, Shouko. You can at least fantasize about the three of us later. But there's no pressure, either way.

But we're both the type of people who like a little complexity to our romance. We're both happy, and we can both enjoy things like this. It lets us reconnect and explore different sides of each other.
...But... If we're talking about wanting more, or wanting things for tonight... Well, I do have a theory that she always has a bit more fun when we can... hm... redeem a villain.

state.text: Well... not technology, Meia. Magic. [{plagg!}Pfft. It's all my hard work, Meia.{!reset}]

[{plagg!}Phew. A woman with blue hair who's uptight? And Marinette isn't even here? Scandalous!{!reset}] Well... I'm happy to have fun on my own, Plagg. And yes. Magic's a great thing, wouldn't you say?

case.state: Well... I think we'd have to try and find out, wouldn't we, Erufuda?
Hm... I'm sure I could try it.
Well, Ringo... if you want to dream, you have to sleep. And maybe that means I should take you to bed, first?
A little direct... but let's try it again. Imagine if I opened with... "I want to get you naked and lick you all over." You may want that, but you want to work a bit for it, right?
Not at all, Ringo. Everyone's first time's a bit of a mess. So you're doing great, by comparison.

state.text: 『{plagg}His name is Adrien, but you know that I'm Plagg, the Kwami of destruction! {!reset}』 Don't worry. I'm pretty much the same person, just less... hero-y, Cagliostro.
W-well, I'd say I'm plenty interesting even without my outfit... 『{plagg}Bwahahah! I like this girl. Normally they're always like "Ooo, Adrien!" {!reset}』

case.state: Well... if you're having fun teasing me, you don't need to take your time, Mari...
You'd better be careful. When it's out... well, you might not be able to stop yourself.
I... wouldn't be against that...
That could be fun. You're usually the one saving me from mind control...
I'd like to think you're the one with the looks... but then again, maybe that's the professional in me, speaking.
You flatter me, and impress. You're a treasure, Marinette.
...Well, if it'll help, I wouldn't mind.
...When you put it that way, I'd be happy to help you out. Just a little.
You can admit that you like orgasming for me, milady. It's not like there's a lot of secrets left. Take as long as you want.
You don't have to wait on my account. I can always take care of you later, you know...
H-hey there, Bugaboo... 『{plagg}If you'll excuse me, I have better things to do than watch you to do whatever you're doing. {!reset}』
『{plagg}Well, this isn't the first time I've... I'll just get going. There's got to be cheese here, right?{!reset}』 Um... sorry, Marinette.
I should get you into the bath more often, milady. You deserve the, ah... chance to relax.
If you like the view... maybe we could try going pantsless under our suits more often. I'm finding that really appealing...
...Or maybe you'd like it if I could try someone else on for size?
Do you have as much fun watching me with someone else as I do watching you?
As you wish, Marinette. I think I can make something you'll get to enjoy.
Mm... well, I know what you're looking for, milady. Let's see what we can cook up.
Whoops! No take backs, right? Guess you're really going to have to be doing some saving tonight, Bugaboo.
Oops. I can land on my feet... but looks like I can't put that back on. What? They weren't as excited by the belt...
You aren't saying that to just be nice, are you, Ladybug?
I'll take off my socks too, since apparently they aren't helping much... and I hope you're not just saying that to be nice.
I can take off more of my clothes if you want, but... you're going to have to keep up the compliments.
Is this the part where you admit you wouldn't mind me taking off more clothes?
Well, I don't mind keeping it interesting if that's what you're into. We'll still have Lucky Charm and Cataclysm, right?
I'd hardly expect we're going to lose, Ladybug. What kind of dramatic tension would there be if we were going to learn each other's identity because of a game of cards?
Oh, I'm pretty sure she's interested in someone else. But if you're as talented in the bakery as you are in the boroughs, it only makes you that much more compelling.
Well, I'd want someone who could appreciate both sides of me, Milady. I wouldn't be surprised if... that girl was someone we both knew.
One way or another, I think playing this a bit fast and loose will get the Akuma to show up. If there is an Akuma.
Well, we already know who you are, Marinette... maybe we'll find out how many lives I have left, too.
...You don't think I smell weird, right?
...I'm not sure if it's a compliment, but...
You're being so over, so early? Scandalous, Marinette.
I might be your partner but... I hope that's not too scandalous for everyone else here.
You better be careful. Overconfidence can lead you to do all kinds of stupid things.
I hope you don't mind if I start winning, milady. Now that we're tied up, I feel like I don't need to hold back...
It's a good thing you're so cute when you're flustered.
You're normally so composed... it's pretty cute to see you flustered, milady.
And here I thought you'd like the flirting, milady.
Well, if you want to see my rod, there goes your chance.
I think you can wait just a little longer, Marinette. Can't you?
We don't want to pull out our finishing moves too early, do we?
Marinette...!
...Well. Now I'm thinking about it too. Zut.
I'm glad you feel the same way, Marinette.
Marinette, maybe we should fool around later then? As if it weren't a foregone conclusion.
Well... this cat's out of the bag. Let's see if you can't up your game once I'm in a bit more danger, Marinette.
Tikki, have you considered giving her some more advice? She's awfully cute when she's flustered, though.
Oh? But I thought you'd prefer I keep the game brief.
Well, milady, you're always welcome to dress me up how you'd like. But for now, let's keep our expectations brief.
Oh? Well, j'attend.
As much fun as everyone else is... as long as we get to attend to each other, that's fine by me.
I'm going to be able to do things just right, I'll have you know. I'm always ready for you.
You say that like I wouldn't know what to do with you...
Maybe we could try your-- ah-- I see.
Well, since you're offering, maybe we could try it in your-- ah-- so what you're saying is no... zut.
...You sure know how to make things better, Marinette.
...I forget that you're a lot more self conscious about your size than I am...
It feels strange winning alone. Here. Let me speed this up so I can join you.
I'm just going to hurry about and join you. It's a win either way, right?
Well, let me speed this up just a little bit. Maybe the Akuma's gotten into you, though?
You don't have to tell me twice.
Are you trying to flirt with me or make fun of me...? About touching...
Also, Ladybug, you might want to watch your phrasing...
And to think it's usually you that's... nevermind.
Well... I think you're giving a compliment, but could you not have fun at my expense, Ladybug?
Well... is now the time or the place? But... I think so.
I think so too, but... maybe we should wait until later?
If you think she's cute like this, think of how she's got to look when I make her climax.
She's even sexier when she cums. I'm pretty sure you'll all get to see it soon, right?
I always think you're sexy, but I can't come up with any good flirting right now.
I'm Adrien, not Cat Noir right now, so forgive me if I find you a little... wordless, milady.
This really does get you purring, doesn't it?
Marinette--! Now this is fun.
I know how hard you work to get that type of filling out. Would be a shame to waste it.
Maybe we should consider trying to stuff it into a different type of confection tonight... I'm sure there's a few people here who'd love to taste test.
So direct.
I'm glad you're complex, milady. You're anything but easy.
Well, I beat you fair and square. Maybe you should let me choose tonight. You know I wouldn't ever let you down.
Quite the incentive, milady... but considering how badly you lost, maybe I should get to choose the terms of your surrender tonight?
『{plagg}It seems like Ladybug's a bit of a not-so-secret admirer, Adrien... {!reset}』 Milady, Plagg has a point. Did you suddenly find Cat Noir a bit more attractive?
Oh? You've heard of me? I'm honored, milady. 『{plagg}Oh no, your secret identity... anyway, got any cheese, Adrien?{!reset}』
Well... I am a model. What good am I if I can't present something fun for the people I care about?
I'm just glad you're liking what you see, milady. But... I think you'll like what's next even more. Or I hope you will, anyway.
『{plagg}Wow... it's like you already know each other outside of your costumes or something...!{!reset}』 Ignore Plagg, milady. I'm glad you think so!
Well... all the charm and confidence can't just be for when I'm behind the mask, right? 『{plagg}How anticlimactic... got any cheese, Adrien? And where's the Akuma? Is there one? {!reset}』
『{plagg}Well hello to you too, Tikki! Come onnnn, let them have some fun!{!reset}』 Good to see you too, Marinette.
I have to say, this was a lot of fun. I think it can only get better from here, can't it? 『{plagg}Oh nooo... they totally know each other's secret identities... who'd have guessed, Tikki? {!reset}』
With an offer like that, how could I say no?
...You're really something special, you know that, don't you?
『{plagg}Have some faith, Sugarcube! They're good enough at this that I don't even care...{!reset}』 It's a small world, Marinette... but I'm glad you're in my world.

I have to admit, it's hard to pretend to not know your secret identity. But... it's still pretty fun. 『{plagg}These two are really something, aren't they, Tikki? He's certainly my favorite Cat Noir.{!reset}』
Ah, Tikki, you know how she gets. It's part of her charm.
Marinette, I think you'll be admitting to far more interesting in a few hands... so just have fun! Tikki, any backup?

『{plagg}Well, they're the first Ladybug and Cat Noir to be this open about it. What could go wrong?{!reset}』 Marinette, I think Tikki has a point. But... as long as we're together, I know we'll get through anything.
Aww... but Marichat is so fun. 『{plagg}Meh, they worked really hard for the reveal, Tikki. I didn't even let him bribe me with cheese, so I worked hard to wait, too!{!reset}』
I hope you don't think being up a single hand means I've lost, milady. If anything, this makes me want to try harder to make sure I win.
Oh, I don't mind that at all. But... I hope you know I'm not beaten yet!
Well, don't stop there, milady. Continue extolling my virtues. 『{plagg}Who knew you could flirt? All it took was her getting naked for you to stop thinking of her as just a friend, huh?{!reset}』
『{plagg}They're weird, but they're fun! Like gooey, ripe cheese... they're also cheesy.{!reset}』 Ignore Plagg. He's fun most times but right now... I just want to listen to you ramble, milady.
Well, when you put it that way... I think no matter what way the game goes, it's pretty much a win, right?
I don't mind losing first... though... maybe whoever stays in the game longer should get to pick who we take home?

『{plagg}Oh? It's that time of the week, huh?{!reset}』 Milady, I just want you to have fun. Sorry I'm running a bit behind. You're welcome to... you know. Invite someone else, if you want. It's only fair.
Hi, milady. I'm happy as long as you are, you know. 『{plagg}What's there to figure out, Tikki? I'll leave when you do, at this point. {!reset}』
Well... if you get started, you'll get to enjoy another reveal when you're in the moment...
I don't usually get to tease you... but if you wanted to get started, I think you'd really enjoy me taking off my underwear, right?
Oh, right. Um... Plagg, could you? 『{plagg}Oh noo.... does Tikki know? Anyway, see you later. I can go taunt her about this. {!reset}』
『{plagg}She's naked but there's no Tikki-- Oh, this is a sex thing, right? I can go if you-- {!reset}』 --Please, Plagg.
You aren't wrong but... weren't you going to flirt with me more?
I... I'm glad you think that, but I'd rather have had some more explicit flirting, you know?
You always know just what to say... if not how to say it.
Well, it's good to see that you're still enamored with me... but I think we've got a full set of other folks here to enjoy, don't you?
Tikki, I really wouldn't worry so much. She drives me wild, too.
Well... I'm crazy for her too, Tikki.
Do I measure up to what you've been thinking of, milady?
Well... I can't say I'm against that idea, milady.
Well... I think that can be arranged...
I'm interested... mind elaborating, milady?
That fantasy is one I can promise I'll make come true.
Well... let's make it come true, milady.
Well, you can enjoy me even more now, can't you?
I don't think you've missed out on all that much... but if this helps your perspective...
Thanks for making me feel comfortable in my own skin, Marinette.
I just wish you were more undressed-- you could start to enjoy it a lot more... intimately.
Bugaboo...
You flatter me, Marinette. Though... definitely more than just five minutes. And definitely more than just once, compared to our finishing moves.
It's just more ways to have fun and enjoy each other, right?
Well, there's all kinds of ways for us to show our love for each other, aren't there? And... other people let us figure that out, right?
I don't mind a bit of restraint... but I don't think I can really stop myself now, milady.
Oh... after all you've made me wait, I'm not allowed to take care of myself? We'll see about that, Marinette.
...I feel the same way. But let's finish strong. Like we always do.
Oh... well, if we lose together, maybe we don't need someone else... but that sort of defeats the purpose, don't you think?
I think you're a little disorganized, milady. Maybe I should pick?
If you change your mind, that's fine, but... I think having someone else to round us out isn't the worst thing that could happen tonight...
You just need to take the time to get to know me. That's all.
And I thought Ladybug had some clever comebacks...
You're going to have to take off your mask too, hm? 『{plagg}Girls in masks, boys in masks... it's always mask, mask, mask with you, Adrien. Who's this?{!reset}』
『{plagg}Yawn. Adrien, I want some cheese! And not some cheesy line!{!reset}』 Well, too bad. I want Susie to drop her mask. It's strip poker, isn't it? Can't you lower your guard?
You took off your mask, but... maybe you could let down your guard, too, Susie? 『{plagg}Girls in masks, boys in masks... it's always mask, mask, mask with you, Adrien. Who's this?{!reset}』
『{plagg}Yawn. Adrien, I want some cheese! And not some cheesy line!{!reset}』 Susie, you know you can let down your guard with me, right? I'm a superhero. So... let's be nice to each other, hm?
Doctor Ziegler, I'm afraid I've come down with a condition where I can't keep my eyes off of a beautiful healer...
Ah, Angela, I'm afraid I'm suffering from a preoccupation of the mind. Might you suggest any exercises to help?
If you think this is a dream, maybe I could indulge those fantasies a bit more, Ringo?
...Is everything okay, Cagliostro? That's... pretty mean of you to say that. I'm sorry, did I hurt your feelings earlier, or something like that?
You’re definitely a switch. Oh, the things we can learn, 9S! The things we can learn, haha!
You say fixated, I say dedicated. ...I think some of the strongest women in my life have had blue hair. Thanks for the… uncomfortable realization.
Getting some really mixed messages.
I'd rather enjoy stinky cheese than harass people at a friendly card game, personally.
...I'd kind of rather just do something a little more personal, though.
...I guess.
If Ladybug can’t deal with the Akuma in your camera, I could give it a shot…
You'd be really surprised how rarely people actually just like me for me…
Kinda hard to talk when my mouth’s full, anyway, huh, McCree?
Um. I don't know that word, but I'm unhappy with the insinuation.
Uh… dark, much?
For anyone watching, I promise you, it's not just me!
I'll let you judge for yourself. Though... Maybe there's another tail you wouldn't mind me wearing...?
With pleasure, my lady. What did you have in mind?
Oh? With pleasure... But what did you have in mind, Nadia?
...Though, maybe, judging by your purr... You don't really mind what you're seeing.
『{plagg}Wow, someone that doesn't mind that you smell like cheese...{!reset}』 Well, gosh, Erufuda. I'm glad you know me for my civilian stuff, too.
Ah, that old commercial? I'm surprised anyone remembers it. 『{plagg}The fragrance is cheese, by the way.{!reset}』
There. Hm... I have to say, Polly, seeing you in nothing but my ~clothing~ is certainly... giving me ideas.

If I might be... suggestive, maybe there's more like two or three places I might put my package in you, Polly, oui? I don't usually get to enjoy that last place... so maybe you'd be interested in trying it?
You could buy me a drink. I have to say I'm a fan of cognacs, if you must. But I find you plenty intoxicating, Polly.
If you'd be interested... I can certainly entertain that... though perhaps you'd prefer something else?
Maybe... you'd show me something naughty, just to really make sure?

I'm sure you'd really enjoy something more than my tongue there, oui? And... it would be okay if I came inside you, right? I don't sleep with many people, if you can believe it. So I'd prefer not to bother with a condom.
...Yeah. I think forgiveness is really important, and at some level... Well, I understand what he did and why he did it. But... I think it'll take me a long time to fully forgive him.

I go back and forth on that, Shouko. Forgiveness is... sort of the nature of my hero philosophy. But it makes... sometimes people make that harder than they should've. Even if you get why it doesn't change the how.
Thanks, Shouko. Really. But... I think you'd prefer me more as a fun person than as an angsty hero type.
I... Well, I'd love to flirt and pretend things are fine, but give me a minute, okay? Let's get back into the game. Maybe we can talk some other time about it.
I'll appreciate the confidence boost. I'm told I look even better naked, so let's play the game a bit longer, hm?
Okay, Shouko. Well... If you're sure, I'll enjoy the confidence boost. But let's see if that holds up once I'm naked, hm?
Well, you could always try modeling nude, and I could give you advice, Shouko, if you want me to be fully transparent. It's hard to lie when you're looking at someone beautiful.
I'm glad we're playing cards and not fighting in Paris, Perona, because you can seem a bit... threatening. I'll take the compliments and gaze, though.
You know, you seem like you'd probably be a villain if you were in my world, but it's my night off and you're being pretty complimentary.
Yeah, yeah. Sorry for being blunt, just want to make sure we both have a good time.

That's... well... it was already pretty sticky by the time I got there, but it was kind of an accomplishment to give it to them for hard and long enough that a certain piercing containing the Akuma broke right as I came...
Well... She can get a bit rough when she gets jealous. It's a good thing you have those wings, Rouge, because if you're really serious, you're probably not going to be able to walk tomorrow.
Don't worry, Rouge. He's a cheese purist. If I feed you a nice wine, though...?
I guess it shouldn't surprise me that I've got admirers everywhere, right?
And the feeling when he finishes, and you can feel each pump and spurt... It's hard not to finish too. Since you were curious.
Well, all I can hope is that I make my fans happy. As Adrien or as Cat Noir.
Heh. Well, let's give you something fun to spread rumors about, even if they must just stay rumors, Sayaka...!
I'm flattered you're worried, but you know what they say: A cat gets nine lives. I've still got about seven or eight, left.
Though, I guess Plagg's a really good friend too. And then there's Marinette. She's... So very special to me.
But... Marinette's probably my most special friend. You don't meet many people like her. But the world probably couldn't handle too many Marinettes. Or Plaggs, for that matter.
That's... ah, sorry. I don't mean to bring down the mood. It's just a tough thing for me to talk about.
It's... Ah, shoot. Sorry, Shouko. I know you meen well... It's just... well, let's enjoy the game.
You know, if I didn't know any better, Shouko, I'd get the feeling we're a bit like the pot calling the kettle black. Let's just be happy someone's happy we're here, right?

state.text: I'm still a superhero, Mari. If you were worried about that. 『{plagg}He's also a model too, and very interested in girls like you. Now, wing-Kwami'ing efforts done, cheese, Adrien?{!reset}』

case.state: Considering the price of your flattery... I imagine there's a lot I'll need to do to meet you. I'd hate to take a bargain on rare goods like... you...

『{plagg}Oh, you're playing Strip Poker tonight, Adrien? And who's the busty lady with red hair? She's pretty, but she'd be prettier with cheese.{!reset}』
Sorry, Nami. This is Plagg.
This is Plagg. He's the spirit that helps me transform. 『{plagg}The avatar of destruction myself! Got any Camembert? Cheddar? I'll settle for parmesan!{!reset}』
Well... Hopefully this isn't too much different, Yang. 『{plagg}Yawn. Cheese? Wow... a chesty blonde! Okay. Your problems are acknowledged. You feeding me now, Adrien?{!reset}』
『{plagg}Wow! She's... uh... I'm... Plagg. Nice to meet you, milady.{!reset}』 Right. This is Plagg, I'm Adrien, and together, we're Cat Noir. I'm a bit more interested in you than he is, obviously.
Confidence begins when you're not transformed. I'm sure you're plenty beautiful outside of your costume-- though I'm sure we'll see that tonight, hm?
I've yet to meet a magical girl that's not... well substantially above average. I think you're not giving a form-fitting outfit it's fair shake.
Well... Hopefully this isn't too much different, Yang. 『{plagg}Yawn. Cheese? Wow... a chesty blonde! Okay. Your problems are acknowledged. You feeding me now, Adrien?{!reset}』
『{plagg}Wow! She's... uh... I'm... Plagg. Nice to meet you, milady.{!reset}』 Right. This is Plagg, I'm Adrien, and together, we're Cat Noir. I'm a bit more interested in you than he is, obviously.
Blackmail doesn't really... stick to someone like me. Maybe you should focus on having a good time tonight, Sayaka?
It's a real concern... but I think I've been doing this for long enough that I've got it handled. It is rather touching, though, Sayaka...
Hm... well, I'm really flattered, Sayaka. I don't know all of them... but I'd be happy to point you in the right direction.
I see. Well... if you have a special someone, I can give you a few recommendations... but if you want a special someone for one night... I can give you other suggestions.
Be honest. A frilly dress, or this view, Sayaka? What's more interesting?
I think my girlfriend's pretty... well. I think I can impress her in just about anything. but let's talk about you tonight, hm?
Who doesn't love a secret?
I have to say, I rather enjoy the idea of your secret more than mine, Sayaka...
...But if you're going to enjoy my appearance... maybe we should help you masturbate to the real thing?
Hm... maybe you'd rather enjoy a fun memory than a calender, though, Sayaka...
Well, all I can hope is that I make my fans happy. As Adrien or as Cat Noir.
Heh. Well, let's give you something fun to spread rumors about, even if they must just stay rumors, Sayaka...!
『{plagg}What's... oh, is that that rockstar you listen to on occasion?{!reset}』 S-so what if it is, Plagg? Nice to meet you in... uh, the normal way, Ibuki.
『{plagg}Adrien? Are you playing strip poker... with a vampire?{!reset}』 She thought I was a cute cat burglar, Plag...
Well... I hope you still like my whole "thing," Marceline. 『{plagg}Are you flirting with a villain? Not your best idea, but probably not your worst.{!reset}』
Well, given how beautiful you are, Sheena, I'd hope it'd be you!
With your beauty, Sheena, I hope it'd be you, at very least!
I-It's more than enough to make you climax, you know...!
Sorry, Ringo, you'll need to wait a bit if you want to see... Everything. 『{plagg}She can already see me, Adrien. What more could she want?{!reset}』
『{plagg}Are you going to eat that apple!? It's not cheese but I'm starving!{!reset}』 Sorry, Ringo. If you were imagining me naked under the suit... well, I can say I'm really flattered!
『{plagg}Oh... Oh hey, she knows who you are! And that's Polly Geist!{!reset}』 Um... Hi. Yep, that's me. I can't believe you're a fan.
Ah, I see I'm a big name in your world, too, Polly... 『{plagg}I'm sure she knows who I am. Spirit recognizes spirit, and so on, right, Polly Geist? {!reset}』
Seeing is believing. But, I guess you want to see a lot more of me first, don't you?
『{plagg}Excuse me! I am not a weird cat thing. I'm the Kwami of Destruction, Plagg. Show some respect. {!reset}』 He's not weird. Well... He is, but Plagg means well.
You can all me Adrien, now. And this is Plagg. 『{plagg}He should call me Plagg. The Kwami of destruction, and source of Adrien's powers. {!reset}』
Oh, now I'm only a little cute? Maybe I should turn up the charm.
Tsk, if I'm only a little cute, I think I should do a bit of a better job.
Well... it's not what you have, it's what you do with it, Takatoshi. Speaking of... Any ideas?
『{plagg}Aww... There's a cute catgirl, and you won't even introduce me?{!reset}』 Nadia, this is Plagg. Plagg, Nadia. And... I appreciate the compliment.
I appreciate the compliment. I hope you know that I fit really well into tight suits... and other tight places...『{plagg}You've traded puns for flirting, and Cat Noir for Plagg, miss...?{!reset}』

state.text: Y-Yeah, that's Plagg. He's my Kwami. 『{plagg}I'm much more than a flying cat thing! I'm the flying cat thing, I'll have you know. {!reset}』
Plagg, be nice... 『{plagg}Well, at least Perona has good taste. A charmed time to meet you! Do you happen to have any cheese...?{!reset}』
『{plagg}Does she really need to know, Adrien?{!reset}』 Yes, Plagg. The Guardian would need to know.

case.state: But I'm sure satisfaction can bring both of us back. Again and again.
Anyway... I'm not here to arrest anyone. Besides, if you were really up to no good, there's probably an easier way to get to people's valuables.

I don't have anything against thieves, per se. If you steal something from someone who shouldn't have it in the first place, is that so wrong? It's not like you're taking anything that'd make someone starve, I hope.

state.text: 『{plagg}Childish disguise! It's just indicative of a super powerful kwami, is all!{!reset}』 This is Plagg, Rarity. And I'm Adrien, nice to meet you.

case.state: You know, I think I can must up a way to fill you with inspiration, rarity. Just tell me where and when...
If you're just trying to compliment me to see me naked... well, don't stop there, Rarity. You're a cutie yourself, don't you think?
Well, I'm glad I have your approval. But be careful. Wearing me might be the stylish thing you're looking for.
If you're trying to get me to show off, it's working, Rarity. But I'm sure there's a lot more we could show each other, don't you think?
Considering it's not a professional effort. Well, that opens up all kinds of options...
『{plagg}Jeez... That would've been a bad time for Adrien...{!reset}』 Yeah... that probably would've hurt a lot.
I may not always land on my feet, but I always bounce back!
Hey, I'm feeling lucky. You can keep my staff too. You'll get to see my other staff later, if you start to win.
Aww, don't worry. You're getting more than my belt. You get to keep me here for a few more rounds.

『{plagg}Normally he lasts a lot longer than five minutes. There, now that you know I'm a great wing-Kwami, I'm Plagg, and this is Adrien.{!reset}』 It's nice to just be myself, I hope this is as fun for everyone else as it is for me!
I'm Adrien, and this is my Kwami, Plagg. 『{plagg}I know, I know, you all came here to watch me strip, but I'm already naked. I'll see myself out.{!reset}』
If it makes you feel any better, I'll keep my ring the whole game. So, not too much left to get me naked.
Normally, I get paid money to look sexy and undress. You're all paying me in charm, though.
The classy, casual, boy-next-door look never loses its appeal, does it?
I'm a lot more confident when I'm Cat Noir... but just because I'm a little less flirty doesn't make me shy or awkward.
Tell you what, though. Next turn, it'll be something even better than my costume.
I promise that next round, it'll be even better than my costume.
If you think about it, you'll get to see twice as many people naked when I strip. Adrien and Cat Noir. Plagg too, if you're into that.
But, I think the finished look's worth it. Saving people, and looking good while doing it.
You can stare if you'd like. I'm used to having eyes on me. Play your cards right, and you might just get your hands on the authentic merchandise.
Is the bulge a little aggressive?
I know not everyone's into the big ones... but I hope this look is flattering on me.
I'm not exactly self-conscious... but I'm not great at surprises... if you know what I mean.
So...
I sincerely hope you enjoy the view as much as I've enjoyed viewing the rest of you.
Fine. I'll include the staff.
Sigh. You're lucky I'm such a nice guy. I'll include the staff, too.
So... Adrien Agreste, model, superhero... 『{plagg}Adrien, I'm hungry. Do you have any cheese? Skip the intros and intro the foooooood!{!reset}』
Hello, everyone. I'm Adrien. Nice... game we have going here... 『{plagg}He's awfully charming for a man who forgot about a time limit on his powers... I'm Plagg. Charmed to meet you.{!reset}』
I'll get to the bigger stuff, eventually. But I'm not just going to roll over like this.
I'm good at plenty of stuff. I can't believe poker isn't one of them.
...Darn it. I could've said the shoe is on the other foot.
...I'm thinking of cat puns, now. So thanks for that.
...So, I might be a little submissive. What about it?
...Well, now I'm just going to spend the rest of the game thinking about that.
Well... I'm not a naughty kitty. Yet, anyway.
Hooo... somehow this feels like the stakes are really high...
The underwear is at least flattering, right?

I've only got heart enough for Ladybug... but if you don't mind, I can have eyes for you, ~name~.

If you want some tips to undress with flair, ~name~, I am a model...
『{plagg}Adrien, you're sta-ring...{!reset}』 She's beautiful! I think it's hardly offensive... I hope.
...You know, you're really pretty, ~name~.
『{plagg}Adrien's not really bad with his words, but if the sounds coming from his bedroom are any indication, he's great with his--{!reset}』 Plagg! She's a lady!
Hang in there, ~name~! Don't worry. I may not have my costume, but being a superhero doesn't end when my powers do.
Am I supposed to look? Not supposed to look? I'm not sure what's the right thing to do here...? ~Name~? What do you want?
I've learned that the worst thing you can do is hide who you are. So, ~name~, I'll always support you.
She's really something special, isn't she? 『{plagg}Special enough to stand at attention? I don't get it, but it doesn't look like you will either!{!reset}』
Don't let me distract you, ~name~. You're the charming one here.
All eyes on you, ~name~. Or mine, at least.
This is still a bit new, I'm not making this weird am I?
I won't say anything about how pretty you are if it's only going to make you blush.
A tie, huh? Well... that's neat.
Oh wow, a tie?
You know, I don't like ties. They don't work with my civilian or superhero outfits.
Uh... that's... supposed to happen, right?
Now, it's okay if you misfire every now and then... but... in a game like this usually you mean something else?"
If Cat Noir can work for years to finally land Ladybug, I can wait a few more turns for you to finish undressing, ~name~.
You're not being a tease are you, ~name~?
Have I been a naughty kitty? Are you drawing this out, ~name~?
The longer you spend on accessories, the longer I get to compliment you, ~name~, so I'm not terribly upset.
It's what I expected, but at the same time...
I don't mind you taking your time, it's just adding to how long I get to enjoy your company, ~name~.
What, Cat Noir got your tongue?
Hey, you can do great things with small stuff. I'm hardly going to complain.
Playing the long game, ~name~? That's good. I like a chase.
Nice ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~|~clothing~s)~. It does look better on the floor.
Hm... If I were, say, a model, I'd have it on good authority your ~clothing~'s pretty stylish.
Stayyy peachy, ~name~! It's only your ~clothing~.
『{plagg}You know, he's not going to be here forever, ~name~, if you want to impress him--{!reset}』 Normally, Plagg and I have our disagreements... right now, though...
『{plagg}Here, Adrien, ~name~'s only taking off his ~clothing~! You can sneak a sock back on!{!reset}』 Plagg, I'm not going to cheat.
"Oh no, ~name~, you're only taking off your ~clothing~?" Don't you ever get tired of hearing that?
Wow, you're... really, really intent on winning! That's fine, but I... nevermind.

『{plagg}You're blushing, and it's only his ~clothing~! Is this some fetish of yours I didn't know about? Is this why you always wear clothes?{!reset}』 That's a weird way of framing it, Plagg, but no...
Uh... don't take this the wrong way, but... you're not holding out because I did something wrong, are you?

『{plagg}Jeez... you saw a superhero lose his secret identity, you met a very handsome Kwami... and all you can manage ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ ~clothing~?{!reset}』 Plagg... it's fine. He's just playing the game...

『{plagg}~clothing.ifPlural(~Clothing~ are|~Clothing~ is)~ preeetttty boring, don't you think, pretty boy?{!reset}』 I actually thought it was kind of cool, Plagg, don't put words in my mouth. 『{plagg}Oh, I can think of what ~name~ wants to do with your mouth--{!reset}』
~clothing.ifPlural(~Clothing~ like|~Clothing~s like)~ that must be kind of special to you, right, ~name~?
Kind of the right choice, given... everything else. I don't get why people'd be so offended by that, ~name~.
I think your ~clothing~ was the right call. Don't worry about the rest, ~name~.
Are you trying to flirt, play smart, or both? I respect all of those.
Usually I'm the one getting dirty talked to... I should probably work on that.
Hm... what should I say, ~name~? I'd like your ~clothing~ a lot more if it was the only thing you were wearing, I guess?
Now, just a few more rounds like that, ~name~, and I think you and I are going to learn a lot about each other.
I think your ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~ are|~clothing~ is)~ nice and all... but I'm thinking about something that's a bit more impressive about you, ~name~.
Cat Noir never gives up the chase. And cats are pretty good at chasing tail, you know?
I can't help but think you'd prefer to accessorize me a little differently, ~name~.
I think the sans-~clothing~ look suits you. And I know a thing or two about suits-- cat and otherwise.
Meow. Look at you, ~name~! I know I am.
Would you look at that! No Akuma. Guess we'll move on to the next thing. And the next.
Overconfidence is often a slow and insidious-- I think you're making the right choice, ~name~.
Not all of us can be superheroes, but it really helps to be handsome. Like you, ~name~.
Say, got any more of those, ~name~? Just wondering if you're multiplying them, or something nefarious.
Hm. Well, I guess we get to see your style, if not your skin. From a certain perspective, anyway.
Maybe we'll see a bit more of you soon?
So... with that done, next you'll... 『{plagg}If you start drooling now, you'll be all dry when the next part happens, Adrien. Take your time!{!reset}』
Well then. I guess I'm just wondering what comes next. It's all good, though.
You ~clothing.ifPlural(made those|made that)~ ~clothing~ look good. Probably because it was you wearing it, ~name~.
Hm... I liked your ~clothing~, actually. You look great either way, ~name~.
Well well, look who's showing off now, ~name~! Don't be so shy!

『{plagg}I was hoping he'd take off something bigger than me anyway. When you wear me, I cover everything, though.{!reset}』 I'd really wish you phrase that in any way other than the one you just used, Plagg.

It's actually not half bad to watch you take off your ~clothing~... 『{plagg}Oooo, ~name~'s got Adrien's submissive streak on display! It's not my thing, but it's funny to catch him off guard later. {!reset}』
『{plagg}You learn something new every day! Or Adrien does. I already know everything.{!reset}』 Well, save some learning for the rest of us, Plagg.
Don't let me distract you, ~name~.
Hm. Well... I can't say I don't enjoy a bit of a challenge. Or a lot of one.
This isn't really how I saw this going, but...
Come to think of it, does this place require men to wear accessories? I'm not complaining, but I know a lot of my friends wouldn't even count their small things.
You say that like it was my plan, and not yours! E-er... if it was a plan.
I-it's not like I knew this was going to be the case... it doesn't hurt though...
Hey-- don't do that!
Can't we all just get along? I didn't use my magic powers to disrupt the game....
Imagination's a powerful thing, Ladybug! I can tell you all about mine, if you want?
Whoa... you're really just going to admit that...? That was all it took?
This has... uh... definitely never happened before.
It's not something I said, is it?
This is a lot better than the usual butterflies I have to fight... I hope.
Oh, not an Akuma. This is much better.
Doin' great, bugaboo! We'll get the Akuma, don't you worry.
I haven't forgotten about the Akuma, but maybe this'd be a nice chance to take off our masks, let down our guard...
You worry too much! It's not like--
It's not like we don't already--
Ladybug, one of us knowing the other's identity... is... bad enough... but...
You don't have to go that far, you know, Ladybug!
Plagg's great, most of the time... but so am I when I'm suited up, right?
Well... I may not be suited up, but I hope I can still support you anyway.
The one skill I didn't practice... ugh... sorry, Ladybug.
I think I'd have been a little more help if I'd played better...
Do we... really need to keep up the charade at this point?
At this point, shouldn't we come clean?
What, I can't pull off the black leather look?
Oh, you think this suffices for formal date attire?
I don't feel that teasing me's going to help much right now, Mari-- Ladybug.
Mari-- Ladybug-- I already lost... teasing me's not going to do all that much good now...
Well, the good news is that it's just your shoes. How many pairs do you own of those, anyway?
I have a great sense of fashion, and it's almost a shame you're taking off those flats. You do have backups, at least...
Don't worry, you're always a shoe-in to me!
If you want, I can carry you? Keep your feet off the floor?
If you play along, it'll keep them guessing, anyway. We don't have that much left to hide, Bugaboo.
Well, we've already revealed our identities, Bugaboo... maybe it's fun to just keep them guessing.
『{plagg}Do Marinette's feet stink as bad as yours?{!reset}』 My feet do not stink!
『{plagg}Why are you talking about your shirt, anyway? That's not what she's taking off...{!reset}』 It's just nice, Plagg!
Oh, don't be shy, Bugaboo. I know I'm not.
The embarrassed act is nice... but you're allowed to just enjoy me, you know? That's half the fun of games like this.
I guess there are a few upsides to already being undressed.
Just don't get jealous, milady.
If it's you, does that make it a fetish?
Is it a fetish if it's just the person I love...?
If I'm going to be sticky, I may as well be sweet.
Well... I'm no cupcake but don't you like my frosting, milady?
It's possible that none of them are as charming as me, maybe?
....Though maybe I'm an uncommon view, and it's hard to compare?

state.text: Plagg, have you ever heard of a place like where she's talking about? 『{plagg}Well, there's that Amazonia place. But I'm... er... not allowed there. Tikki can tell you about it. And Atlantis.{!reset}』

『{plagg}I've never heard of a place that was all women... but I tend to prefer men be my keeper. You're easier to mess with.{!reset}』
There've been lady Cat Noirs, haven't there, Plagg?

case.state: That happens to me all the time. Er... my magic power running out. At least your clothes didn't disappear. Yet, at least. Are we about to meet your guardian spirit?
Are we about to meet your Kwami...? Ah... just when my ring runs out of magic, I de-transform. But I'm guessing your armor isn't purely magical.
Huh. Not what I expected, but you're both smart and confident, aren't you?
Smart, confident, and beautiful. I've got my competition tonight, it seems!
Susie, I do wonder... you're a villain, right?
You're a villain, aren't you, Susie...? Sorry. Just trying to make conversation.
The world can be a pretty dark place. But they say living well is the best revenge.
No person is beyond redemption. I think you'd actually make quite the hero.
Have... well. Have you always had high expectations for yourself?
You really strike me as someone who expects a lot of herself. Maybe other people have always expected a lot from you?
I forget, does your world have aliens or magic?
Your version of Earth doesn't have aliens or magic, does it?
It's a pretty miraculous design, hm?
I'd say the design, and the designer are pretty miraculous.
I have a feeling that I'm probably the first magical boy you've met.
So, Sayaka, am I the first magical boy you've ever met?
It's a nice, high-quality outfit. You've got good taste.
Oh, I'm just saying that it takes a high-quality woman to pull off high-quality clothes.
What do you like to wear when you don't have to wear a uniform?
When you're just out being Hilda, how do you usually like to get dressed?
Kicking off your shoes so people can't see up your skirt? I can't say I haven't given that a whirl myself. So, classic modeling move.
I've worn a few skirts in my time. And you're trying to make us work to see what's under there, huh? Classic model trick.
Ah... I'm sorry, Galatea. I thought you'd find it amusing. Sorry.
You don't mind a little flirting, do you?
A bit of flirting is okay, isn't it?
I'm really impressed you can move so easily in that armor. At least my suit's magic, so it makes it easy for me to be so limber.
You don't mind if I've got a feminine side to me, do you?
Well, you're dressed pretty comfortably. You've got a little bit of a masculine side, huh?
I'm just having a lot of fun playing with you. I can relax around you, you know?
I'm having a lot of fun playing with you, you know. I hope you can say the same.
"The Vampire Queen" sounds like a villain... and a dangerous one.
With a title like "The Vampire Queen..." You could be pretty dangerous.
The only thing you're shredding tonight is the melody, and the only thing you're going to kill are the high notes, huh?
You're welcome to rip and tear that melody and shred the high notes, right?
Drama club? Well, I have to say I always respect a person who respects their friends.
Oh... well, I hope your friends appreciate what you're doing for them, Nagisa.
And stylish. Black's always a good color, hm?
And I have to say, I love the black outfit, but I might be a little biased.
Well, maybe the solution is for both of us to get naked, don't you think?
Well, I must be looking pretty magical. Or at least magically pretty, hm?
『{plagg}Well, it's obvious she's blessed by some sort of feline god, right? Much like me!{!reset}』 I guess Plagg must be almost pure aether... huh?
Considering how the game's going, are you sure you wouldn't mind giving us a little hint to keep us focused?
Hats off to you, Misato... Can I buy you a drink?
Hm... taking off your cap is fun, but I think you'd like it a little more if I popped a cap off of a bottle of cold beer?
Well, you can always take this kitty home with you, if you're looking to win a prize.
I hope you know that you're more than welcome to take this kitty home with you if you win.
Well, I suppose you're not terribly familiar with a game like this, are you?
Don't suppose you want to be upfront whether you prefer wood or bushes, then?
You're really enjoying the view if all you're taking off is your ~clothing~...
Oh...? Your ~clothing~? I'm a little embarrassed I didn't even get you to take that off earlier...
I don't mind drawing this out...
Well... you looked great with your ~clothing~, but without it...
It's not exactly what I'd like to see, but if that makes you happy, I don't mind.
If it helps, I think you'll look even better without your ~clothing~.
Ehehe-- sorry, I'll save the suaveness for later, I guess.
Darn, a swing and a miss. Good thing I'm purrrty persistent.
Looking fit for a catwalk, ~name~.
Stylish ~clothing~ you have there.
Hm... say, you don't happen to know the brand of your ~clothing~, do you? ~clothing.ifPlural(They|It)~ looks familiar...
Something like your ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~'re|~clothing~'s)~ all the rage in Paris and New York, I hear. Way to be ahead of the curve, ~name~.
『{plagg}Ooo... people are kind of testy...{!reset}』 I think her ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~ look|~clothing~ looks)~ nice.
Your ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~ are|~clothing~ is)~ pretty stylish!
I don't say this to just everyone, but I think you look really... 『{plagg}Sexy! Slammable! Scrumptuous! {!reset}』 Plagg! 『{plagg}This sock smells like Camembert! I can't not compliment it!{!reset}』
Looks like the cat's got my tongue on this one.
~Name~'s ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(aren't|isn't)~ the first ~clothing~ I've ever seen, but she somehow really pulls the look off.
I think your ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~'re|~clothing~'s)~ fantastic, but I think you'd have way more interesting things to say about it than me.
~clothing.ifPlural(~Clothing~ are|~Clothing~s are)~ definitely always in season. But that's only because a ray of sunshine like ~name~ is wearing it.
Hey, if you want me to strut my stuff with your ~clothing~, ~name~, let me know.
『{plagg}Oh, I know the look on his face. That's his "I'd love to wear only ~name~'s ~clothing~ and parade for her--{!reset}』 Plagg, you aren't wrong, but it's ~name~'s turn...
『{plagg}Say, Adrien, do you think Ladybug'd look good in that?{!reset}』 I'm not sure, but ~name~ really pulls it off.
Well, you're doing a lot of things right, ~name~, so don't listen to anyone being a jerk about the details.
I don't have to be an expert to know that's the right play for the moment.
Hey! Don't I get a say in this! A-and what are you going to be doing? I'm not sure if I should be engaged, excited, or entranced...!
W-wait! Hey! Doesn't what I want matter here? You can't just mercilessly exploit my weaknesses like this...!
Well... I'd say the others don't have anything to worry about since we're here to protect them, but... As long as we're all have fun.
Well, fashion's as good a reason as ever. But don't worry, milady, if you start falling all over yourself, I'm sure I can help.
Oh, well... if you or anything you're wearing happens to start falling, I'm sure I can take care of you.
I can imagine why flashing's not the worst distraction.
Uh, could you not feast on souls? That's a pretty villainous thing to do.
I'd really rather you didn't feast on any souls.
Don't worry, milady, I know it's really distracting here, what, with people like ~player~... But don't you worry, I'll cover you. Just not with clothing.
You seem to have a lot on your mind. Let me think about this one. No, really, I'm having a great time.
It's always a good time for romance, milady!
Milady, stop and smell the roses! This place's got all kinds of sensual energy, and it'd be quite the waste to let it go to waste...
I believe in you, milady. But either way... I have a feeling I'm happy with this just the way that it is.
If you make it through the game with your secret identity intact... mostly... then I think that's a win for me, too.
If there's someone special in your life, they're luckier than even your best Lucky Charms, milady.
I think your Lucky Charm tends to save the day... but you know I'd love you just as much if you were out of your costume. Maybe we'd even have a ton in common. A shared history, oui?
By secret identity... what do you mean, exactly? I'm standing here like a display for you, you know...
Secret identity or "secret identity," Bugaboo? I'm happy either way.
I knew you'd come around!
Well... it only took me getting naked in public, but that's as good of a confession as any.
...You know me so well, milady. I could almost be forgiven for...
I'd never reveal any secrets... but I'm glad you understand me, Mar-- Ladybug. M-Mar... because you're like the sea to my shore...!
Well... get the Akuma, Bugaboo. I think if you're lucky, you might get something else tonight, too.
You know that I don't give up so easily. And the best part about Cataclysm is that it only takes five minutes to get it back.
Uh, nevermind! I don't know why I'd even ask that!
Oh-- uh... yeah! That was a really weird question. It's almost like I'm just into fashion or something...
Well, keep an open mind... it's a lot harder to carry you if we're not both naked.
You're awfully confident now... but if you end up naked, everyone else can see that I offered!
...I was going to say you were the one tying me up... but...
Maybe I'm the one that likes to get tied up...
Sorry, Mari... oh? You're... welcome?
Marinette, sorry for the interruption... or, you're welcome, I guess?
As long as we get to share, I certainly don't mind being shared.
Oh, come on, there's a lot of fun in just enjoying the looks. We can always enjoy more, later, together, you know?
Oh... don't tempt me, Marinette...
You say that like it's such a bad thing. Have I been a bad kitty?
You know me too well to think that.
Such a shame you're so many rounds from losing.
You know me too well to think that.
Such a shame you're so many rounds from losing.

state.text: Plagg, I'm trying to understand her a bit better... that's all. 『{plagg}Oh, don't get jealous, Adrien! I'm sure she doesn't need magical powers.{!reset}』
『{plagg}I think Meia'd make work better with another Kwami. I like you because you're not too serious.{!reset}』 Well, thanks, Plagg, but that's not really what I wanted to talk to her about.

case.state: I'm sure I can find all kinds of ways to keep you entertained during this game. If my wit's not doing it, I'm sure you'll like what you see in a few turns.
Don't worry, I'm just having fun. Aren't you?
Well... ! I'm not a Puyo master, but I'm pretty sure I can get your combo just right.
I have a feeling I can figure out your combo. Do you mind if I try mixing your Puyos up, first?
You know, they say that being a villain brings out the ugliness in your personality... I'm just seeing a cute girl that's a bit confused.
Akumatization... maybe this Entity you're talking about just makes your flaws more evident. But all I'm seeing is a cute girl that's a bit confused.
I'm really big on redemption. It's definitely not easy. But I think anyone can overcome their past.
Well... if you ever think you want to try to be better. You know where to find me.
If it helps, you're a lot like me. Let's just have fun tonight, yeah?
Well... you're in good company.
Well, I've got a few tricks up my sleeve. But they're mostly magic. But you know, magic, technology, sufficiently advanced, etc. etc.
『{plagg}Magic is just sufficiently advanced technology. What she does is pretty important, I think.{!reset}』 Well, it's not an application to Overwatch. But Ladybug and me do alrite on our own.
C'mon, I made you laugh, oui?
I heard a giggle in there!
I think I can make your game a bit better, non?
Well... maybe I just have an affinity for cute magical girls, but I have a feeling we're going to get along quite well.
Well, I'd certainly be happy to see you out of your uniform!
As long as you're out of your uniform, I'd consider it a win. You already make that look good!
I'm just excited to see you excited. Is that so wrong?
You're very striking. But I'm sure you're used to all kinds of sunny compliments.
You're really lighting up the room. I can't say I see many people who look so... distinctive.
Well, if all of Demacia's exports are as fine as you, Lux, I have to say that I'd be honored to visit.
Well, I like the jacket it around the waist, but something tells me you're no stranger to another type of jack-et, huh?
Given that you're a tomboy, I suppose you prefer a different type of jack-et, huh?
You're pretty, but in a protective, handsome sort of way.
I'd say you're more of a handsome woman than a cute one. You could defintely keep me safe.
I'm not much of a musician. But you're playing me like a fiddle.
Hope you don't mind me not really getting music. I'm more of a dancer than a singer.
I can throw a hand or two, if it'll help you win and keep comfortable. Or if you just want to see me naked.
Well... anyway. I hope we'll be getting to see a lot more of you. I can't be the only kitty cat getting naked, don't you think?
Well, let's focus on the game for a while, why don't we? I'm sure we have plenty of time later.
I did find the show funny, but... well, we're here for a reason, aren't we?
Well, there's no sense in relaxing and having fun if you can't have a drink, right?
Well, we're all here to unwind after a hard work week. If we can't cut loose a bit, why do the kinds of stuff we do, Misato?
But... just so you know, I'm not a plush toy. If you want a stuffed kitty... well... we're both getting naked, aren't we?
Though, if you did that... it might be your chat that ends up being stuffed, non?
Well, I'm sure we're in for a good time, tonight. The others have nothing to worry about as long as we're here, right?
Well, can't blame me for being curious, can you?
I already guessed you'd be incredibly interesting based on your stories... but... Who doesn't love an aesthetic compliment?
You'd hear me purring if you got up close, ~name~.
If you couldn't tell by the bell, clearly I'm very into accessories.
You know, throw in a scratch behind my ears in and you've had yourself a pretty good turn.
I can see in the dark, so you're not really keeping me guessing, ~name~.
You wouldn't believe the stuff I see on a day to day basis, so this isn't so bad. At least your ~clothing~ didn't have an Akuma in it.
A lovely lady like ~name~ taking off her ~clothing~? Even a typical day of heroics can't compare to that!
『{plagg}Think ~name~'d let you wear that?{!reset}』 I think I could make it work, but it's more for ladies, Plagg.
Where'd you find your ~clothing~? Just curious. I have a friend I think might appreciate one of those as a gift.
Looking even better, ~name~! 『{plagg}I think the identity reveal was worth more than ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~, personally... {!reset}』
I hope you don't mind if I just take a look to appreciate you, ~name~.
Very stylish, ~name~.
Though, I think ~name~ herself is the best part of her outfit.
You can stare, if you want. I did lose to you.
Well, you're still in the game, ~name~. A woman who tries her best is always attractive.
I think fantasizing can be its own reward...
...You're really making the most out of things. I guess I am too, if you think about it.
Huh... am I... enjoying it more because it's something small?
Somehow, you really made a lot of impact with only your ~clothing~... it's not big, but I guess it's really stylish...
Hey, ~name~, actually, ~clothing.ifPlural(are those|is that)~ ~clothing~ something that's part of your normal style, or did you wear it for the game?
Actually, I have a question... ~clothing.ifPlural(Are ~clothing~|Are ~clothing~s)~ really common where you're from? I think I've seen ones like yours in Paris, but maybe I'm misremembering...

『{plagg}So, ~clothing.ifPlural(are ~clothing~|are ~clothing~s)~ something girls like ~name~ normally wear? I've been around a while and I'm not sure...{!reset}』 If it looks good on her, does it matter? Or... uh, off, now?
『{plagg}Can you say something charming even if she only took off that itty bitty thing?{!reset}』 It's a good thing you don't count as an accessory, Plagg.
I think you're cute whether you're wearing your ~clothing~ or not, obviously.
Making new friends and playing the game itself is probably my favorite part of this.
Well, game recognizes game. It's kind of hard to find you attractive, given the similarities...
No need to hurry on my account, my imagination's doing me quite the service here.
All I can think of is what else you're hiding... I had a secret identity, so what do you have left...?
Well... it definitely helps with the imagination part of this...
I'm trying to think of something clever to say... but I feel like that'd just make me look insecure.
Not a bad thing, but all I can think of what this would be like to play with friends-- old friends, rather than new...
Huh... not sure what else I was expecting at this stage...
Nice ~clothing~, ~name~. Not my choice of style, but it'd be unfair if both of us showed up in catsuits.
~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~'s purrrrfect for lounging in. Or fighting supervillains. It's a scratch for me either way.
I'm glad you wore your ~clothing~, it'd have been pretty embarrassing if I brought mine.
Say, what do you think works better, ~name~'s ~clothing~, or magic-based supersuits? I think the latter, but I'm willing to learn from experience.
Not half bad. I get the feeling I can't really pull it off under skin-tight latex, though.
Your ~clothing~ reminds me of this one villain I fought... not that you're anything like them.
『{plagg}You know that gentleman is neither a Lady or a Bug, right, Adrien?{!reset}』 That's true, but people are more than the masks we wear...
Plagg, any advice? 『{plagg}Feed your Kwami more cheese.{!reset}』 ...Applicable to the situation? 『{plagg}Cheese is always applicable.{!reset}』
You're welcome to join me, ~name~. I've got nothing left to hide.
There's something really liberating about this. It could be the Frenchman in me, though. ...For the body confidence. Not losing.

『{plagg}Did the bodysuit cut off flow to your brain... Nahhh, it's just flowing elsewhere!{!reset}』 I can't help myself...
